loans.name: Bertha Tulia

texts.es:
Bertha ha obtenido gran experiencia en el área de la belleza gracias a su negocio de salón de belleza que con mucho esfuerzo inicio hace 2 años en el municipio de Sincelejo.

Con este oficio intenta conseguir el sustento para sus hijos ya que enviudo hace algunos años.

Solicita un préstamo para realizar la compra de materiales para remodelación de su local y para la compra de insumos como cremas y gel capilares.
texts.en:
Bertha has gained a lot of experience in the beauty area thanks to her beauty salon business. She started this business two years ago with a lot of hard work in the city of Sincelejo. She hopes to support her children with this occupation since she has been a widow for a a few years. 

Bertha is requesting a loan to buy materials to remodel her hair salon and to buy supplies such as hair creams and hair gel.

loans.use: to buy materials to remodel her hair salon and to buy supplies such as hair creams and hair gel.

loans.name: Julia

texts.en:
Julia, 44, is a mother to three girls and two boys. Apart from being a loving mother and wife, she is a diligent businesswoman who patiently saved proceeds from her small tuck shop for many years and eventually had enough to open a daycare center.

The day care has been running for two years but has not been able to attract enough children to sustain itself. "I don't have the right facilities to attract people," says Julia. She is requesting a Kiva loan to install a kitchen unit and good toilets and buy educational toys. By offering comfort and quality, the center will be able to meet the standards of the parents and children in the area.

Julia hopes to see her center grow into a sustainable business that offers comfort and good education to children and also offers employment to members of her community.

loans.use: to install a kitchen unit, pay for the building of toilets and buy toys.

loans.name: Voin's Group

texts.en: A 25-year-old mother of two children (one of them is in school and the other one is too young to attend school), Voin is living in Kampong Cham province. To support her family’s living, she works on another farm for a fee and she can earn about 30,700 KHR per day. Voin has been involved in her business for five years. Voin has been a client of VisionFund for one loan already and completely paid back the loan. The previous loan helped her to have better living conditions. Due to the lack of money to fulfill her needs, she is now leading a group to take a new loan via VisionFund to buy a motorbike to drive to work. She hopes this loan will help to improve her family’s life and enable her to go to work on time.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike to drive to work

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Horng

texts.en:
Crop farming is a common way to earn a living in the rural village of the Dambae district where Horng, 62, lives.  He is married with four children. He and his wife grow rice and he also works as a carpenter. Having been in the business for 44 years, they can earn about 50,000KHR per day to respond to the family’s needs and manage to save about 30,000KHR each day. Low price of crop yields have been their main challenge. 

Horng has never been with VisionFund before, and now he is applying for the first loan to buy seeds, fertilizers and pesticides for his farmland. He hopes to increase crop yields to earn a larger income so as to better his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and pesticides for his farmland

loans.name: Ami

texts.fr: Ami est une femme mariée et âgée de 27 ans qui habite à Baguida. Ami est mère de deux enfants et travaille activement pour son épanouissement. Pour trouver son revenu, Ami vend des casseroles et des objets plastiques en parcourant son quartier. Ami s’approvisionne une fois par mois et demande ce crédit pour commander des bassines et des sceaux en plastiques. Ami souhaite augmenter sa marge bénéficiaire et permettre une bonne éducation à ses enfants.
texts.en: Ami is a married woman, 27 years old, living in Baguida. She is the mother of two children and works actively for the family to thrive. To earn an income, Ami sells pots, pans, and plastic goods by going from district to district. She gets her supplies once a month and is asking for this loan to order some plastic tubs and buckets. She would like to increase her profit margin and enable a good education for her children.

loans.use: to purchase 4 tubs and 8 dozen plastic buckets

loans.name: Khadar

texts.en: Khadar is 25 years old and he lives in Hargiesa. He finished at the University in 2014 and he studied Economics and Political Science. Khadar is single .He started a cold drink business in Hargiesa market. He sells different types of drinks and biscuits. Khadar needs to increase the stock of his cold drink shop in order to generate more income but cannot buy all the required drinks. To do so, he requested a loan of $500 from Kaaba MFI. Kaaba will provide the goods as a loan, and Khadar will then make monthly repayments. In the future, Khadar wants to expand his cold drink shop and open another cold drink shop in the market.

loans.use: to increase his stock of cold drinks.

loans.name: Doan's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Doan, 37 years old, is a Thai woman. She currently lives with her husband and her son in Mai Son district in the Son La province.
	Her family’s main income is cultivation. Their annual income after deducting all costs is just enough to cover the living expense and only allows them to save a small amount. She wants to expand breeding-pig model but the saved amount is not enough. Therefore, she wants to borrow a loan for this purpose.
	She hopes the loan amount will help her family invest effectively in the breeding model with high productivity, and next year the breeding model will bring her family more profit. For herself, she will work hard to get money to repay the loan for M7-MFI on time.

loans.use: to expand breeding-pig model

loans.name: Kankovi

texts.fr: Kankovi est âgée de 44 ans et vit à Baguida. Mariée, Kankovi a cinq enfants à sa charge et travaille dynamiquement pour aider son mari dans leur épanouissement. Kankovi vend des produits d’alimentations générales dans sa boutique afin de réaliser une bonne marge de bénéfice. Kankovi s’approvisionne huit fois par mois au marché de Lomé. Pour acheter un sac de maïs, des détergents et des bols du haricot, Kankovi demande ce prêt pour réaliser son objectif et gagner un profit pour favoriser l’éducation de ses enfants.
texts.en: Kankovi is 44 years old and lives in Baguida. She is married and has five children to support. She energetically works to help her husband for the family to thrive. Kankovi sells grocery items in a store to make a good profit margin. She gets her supplies eight times a month at the Lomé market. To purchase a sack of cron, some detergent, and tubs of beans, she is asking for this loan to realize her goals and to earn a profit for the sake of her children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase a sack of corn, 3 bags of detergent, and 16 tubs of beans

loans.name: Adjovi

texts.fr: A 45 ans, Adjovi  est une femme mariée et vit avec trois enfants à Baguida. Bien consciente de son état elle vend des légumes dans son quartier afin de générer un bénéfice pouvant couvrir les charges quotidiennes. Adjovi  achète son stock auprès de ses fournisseurs trois fois par mois et en tire assez de profits. Adjovi désire ce crédit pour commander des laitues afin de trouver son bénéfice pour subvenir favorablement aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en: Adjovi, aged 45, is a married woman living with three children in Baguida. Well aware of her situation, she sells vegetables in her district to generate a profit for covering day-to-day expenses. She purchases her goods from suppliers three times a month and derives a fair profit. Adjovi would like this loan to order some lettuce, make a profit, and thus meet the needs of her family.

loans.use: to purchase 5 units of lettuce

loans.name: Belemvire Group

texts.fr:
Mme FATI est responsable du groupe  BELEMVIRE. Mariée elle est mère d’un (01) enfant. Il est agé de 18 ans et il va à l’école. Elle à 03 personnes en charge.
Madame fait le commerce de sucre depuis 07 ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans  les pays voisins.
Avec l’argent octroyé, elle veut s’acheter 12 sacs de sucre.
Elle veut utiliser les bénéfices du prêt pour agrandir son activité et aussi payer la scolarité de son enfant. Elle ambitionne aussi être une grossiste et elle compte construire un grand magasin pour stocker son sucre.
texts.en:
Ms. FATI is the official of the group BELEMVIRE. She is the married mother of one child, a son, who is 18 years old and going to school. She has three persons to support. 

Ms. FATI has been doing commerce in sugar for seven years. She gets her supplies from neighboring countries. With the money granted, she wants to purchase 12 bags of sugar. She wants to use her profits from the loan to expand her business and also to pay for her child’s education costs. Her ambition is also to be a wholesale merchants, and she is planning on building a large store for stocking her sugar.

loans.use: to purchase 12 bags of sugar

loans.name: Songre La Panga De Koulgorin Group

texts.fr:
M. ARBA est responsable du groupe  SONGRE LA PANGA KOULGORIN. Marié il père de 07 enfants. Le plus âgé a 15 ans et le moins âgé a 04 ans. 06 enfants vont à l’école et il a 17 personnes en charge.
Monsieur fait l’élevage depuis 11 ans et 06 mois. Il s’approvisionne  dans les villages environnants.
Avec l’argent octroyé, il compte s’acheter 03 moutons et 30 poules. 
Monsieur veut utiliser les bénéfices du prêt pour s’occuper de sa famille. Il ambitionne être plus tard un grand éleveur.
texts.en:
Mr. ARBA is the official of the group SONGRE LA PANGA KOULGORIN. He is the married father of seven children. The oldest is 15, and the youngest is 4. Six of the children go to school. He has seventeen persons to support. 

Mr. ARBA has been a livestock farmer for 11 years and 6 months. He gets his supplies from nearby villages. With the money granted, he intends to purchase 3 sheep and 30 hens. He wants to use the profits from the loan to take care of his family. His ambition is to be a major livestock farmer later on.

loans.use: to purchase 3 sheep and 30 hens

loans.name: Dan's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Dan, born in 1972, is the Thai ethnic woman. Her family consists of four members, including her husband, her son, her daughter and she. Her two children are obedient and good at studying, and they are at university. Her family is in Mai Son district in Simple on La province.

	Her family’s main occupation is cultivation and breeding, so the annual income after deducting costs is just enough to cover the living expenses of the family and she saved a small amount. However, the saved amount is not enough to pay her children’s education fees. Therefore, she wants to borrow a loan to pay for her children’s education fees and invest more in their education.
	She hopes that the loan amount will help her children have better conditions for studying, and then they will get a good job after the graduation. She will work hard to get money to repay the loan for M7-MFI on time.

loans.use: to pay for her children’s education fees

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Mariée et âgé de 36 ans, Afi est une femme très entreprenante et active dans la gestion de ses besoins. Avec quatre enfants à charge, Afi habite à Baguida et prépare de la pate bandée à base du maïs et des poulets pour la restauration de ses clients. Ce commerce lui apporte son bénéfice et Afi s’approvisionne une fois par mois auprès de ses fournisseurs. Pour acheter un sac de maïs et des poulets, Afi demande ce crédit pour financer sa commande et réaliser assez de profit pour répondre favorablement aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en: A married woman, aged 36, Afi is very enterprising and active in managing her life. With four children to support, she lives in Baguida and makes pate bandée made from corn and chicken to cater to her customers. This work brings in a profit. She gets her supplies once a month from suppliers. To purchase a sack of corn and some hens, Afi is asking for this loan to finance her order and to realize enough profit to respond positively to the needs of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a sack of corn and 5 hens

loans.name: Ayawa

texts.fr: Ayawa est une femme mariée âgée de 24 ans. Mère de quatre enfants, Ayawa vit à BAguida pour entreprendre ses activités. Pour répondre aux besoins de sa famille, Ayawa est une couturière qui confectionne des habits pour vendre dans le quartier afin d’avoir un revenu. Ayawa s’approvisionne trois fois par mois au marché. Dans le souci d’acheter des pagnes pour la confection des habits, Ayawa sollicite ce crédit pour acheter des pièces de pagnes afin d’avoir une bonne rentabilité afin de soutenir son mari à subvenir aux besoins quotidiens de la famille.
texts.en: Ayawa is a married woman, 24 years old, and the mother of four. She lives in Baguida to operate her business. To respond to the needs of her family, she is a seamstress who makes clothing to sell in the district, so as to have an income. She gets her supplies three times a month at the market. Concerned about purchasing 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa) for sewing clothing, Ayawa is requesting this loan to buy some ‘pagne’ cloth in order to be profitable. She could then support her husband in meeting the day-to-day needs of the family.

loans.use: to purchase 4 lengths of 'pagne' cloth

loans.name: Adjovi

texts.fr: Adjovi vit à Baguida et est âgée de 40 ans. Mariée, Adjovi est mère de trois enfants et œuvre dynamiquement pour favoriser leur éducation. Adjovi vend des perles dans son quartier et ses environs pour avoir son revenu nécessaire pour leur subsistance. Adjovi s’approvisionne trois fois par mois au marché. Pour commander des paquets de perles Adjovi demande ce prêt pour réaliser son achat et tirer sa rentabilité.
texts.en: Adjovi lives in Baguida and is 40 years old. A married woman, she is the mother of three and energetically works for the sake of their education. She sells beads in and around her district to make the income necessary for their subsistence. She gets her supplies three times a month at the market. To order packets of beads, Adjovi is asking for this loan to realize her purchase and to reach profitability.

loans.use: to purchase 5 packets of beads

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Afi est une femme mariée qui vit à Baguida. Agée de 28 ans, Afi est très dynamique et  vend des produits cosmétiques et des peignes pour gagner son revenu quotidien. Grâce à cette activité, Afi arrive à faire une bonne épargne et tirer un bon profit de son activité. Afi s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché local. Pour équiper son atelier, Afi demande ce prêt pour acheter des pommades et des déodorants pour gagner son revenu et atteindre ses objectifs.
texts.en: Afi is a married woman who lives in Baguida. She is 28 years old and very energetic selling cosmetic products and combs to earn a daily income. Thanks to this business, she manages to save some money and to make a good profit. She gets her supplies twice a month at the local market. To supply her shop, she is asking for this loan to purchase some ointments and deodorants to earn an income and achieve her goals.

loans.use: to purchase 10 ointments and 17 deodorants

loans.name: Estefhania

texts.es:
Estefhania, una joven de 18 años de edad, soltera, dedicada a la venta de bolsos en un almacén heredado por su familia ubicada en Bello.
Es una mujer hábil y muy trabajadora, su sueño es continuar sus estudios.

Con el préstamo comprara cuero, lo cual le permitirá fabricar más bolsos y lograr tener una buena rentabilidad por sus trabajos.
Tu puedes apoyar a esta mujer a continuar con sus estudios, haz un préstamo.
texts.en:
Estefhanía, a 18-year-old young woman, single, sells handbags in a store inherited by her family, located in Bello. She is a skillful and very hardworking woman. Her dream is to continue her studies.

With the loan, she will buy leather which will allow her to make more bags and manage to have a good profitability by her work. You can support this woman to continue her studies. Make a loan.

loans.use: to buy leather to make more bags.

loans.name: Souvenise

texts.fr: Souvenise, 58 ans, vit en union libre. Elle a 5 enfants. Pour subvenir aux besoins de la famille, elle vend des vêtements. Dynamique et très déterminée à changer sa condition financière, elle a recours à des prêts pour faire évoluer son commerce. Elle a déjà obtenu plusieurs microcrédits qui l’ont beaucoup aidée. Elle cherche un nouveau prêt pour augmenter son stock.
texts.en: Souvenise, aged 58, lives in a common-law marriage. She has five children. To meet the needs of the family, she sells clothing. Energetic and very determined to change her financial condition, she has turned to loans to advance her business. She has already had several micro-loans, which have helped her a lot. She is looking for a new loan to increase her inventory.

loans.use: to purchase clothing

loans.name: Desilia

texts.fr: Mère de 4 enfants, Desilia est âgée de 44 ans et vit en union libre. Elle est propriétaire d'une épicerie où elle vend des produits alimentaires. Cette activité lui permet de gagner les revenus nécessaires pour nourrir sa famille.  Elle a besoin d’un microcrédit pour augmenter son stock et tirer plus de bénéfices de son commerce.
texts.en: The mother of four, Desilia is 44 years old and lives in a common-law marriage. She is the owner of a grocery store, where she sells provisions. This business enables her to earn the income necessary to feed her family. She has need of a micro-loan to increase her inventory and to make more profit from her commerce.

loans.use: to purchase cases of milk and juices

loans.name: Fabienne

texts.fr: Fabienne, 31 ans, est mère d’un enfant en bas âge.  Elle gère un petit commerce de produits alimentaires et d’épices,  pour trouver de quoi faire vivre sa famille. Elle souhaite que son petit commerce progresse. Elle demande un microcrédit pour augmenter son stock.
texts.en: Fabienne, aged 31, is the mother of a young child. She manages a small-scale business selling grocery items and spices to earn a living. She would like her business to progress. She is asking for a micro-loan to increase her inventory.

loans.use: to purchase some garlic and bottles of oil

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cases of carbonated beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase detergents and laundry soaps

loans.name: Maria Delia

texts.es:
Un taller de confección es el medio con el cual María busca el sustento de su hogar conformado por sus dos hijos.

En este taller realiza diferentes prendas que son muy buscadas por sus clientes y almacenes.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de una máquina de confección y también para poder realizar algunas mejoras locativas a su taller.
texts.en: A tailor shop is the means by which Maria looks to provide for her household including her two children. In this shop, she makes different articles of clothing that are highly sought after by her customers and stores. She is requesting a loan to buy a sewing machine and also to make some renovations to improve her tailor shop.

loans.use: buy a sewing machine and also make some renovations to improve her tailor shop.

loans.name: Saintil

texts.fr: Saintil est pasteur d’église. C’est un homme respecté dans la communauté. À 62 ans, marié et père de cinq enfants, Saintil est encore débordant d’énergie dans ses activités. Il tient une petite boutique de produits alimentaires. Grace à cette activité, il gagne les revenus nécessaires pour répondre à ses besoins quotidiens et faire un peu d’épargne.
texts.en:
Saintil is a church pastor who is respected in the community. He is 62 years old, married, and the father of five children. He is still bubbling with energy for all his activities. 

He has a small grocery shop. Thanks to this business, he earns the income he needs to meet his daily needs and also a little extra for savings.

loans.use: buy rice and candy.

loans.name: Elide

texts.fr: Elide est âgée de 46 ans. Elle est divorcée et a 3 enfants à sa charge. Pour prendre soin de ses enfants, elle vend des produits cosmétiques et des extensions pour cheveux. Cette activité lui permet de prendre en charge la scolarité des enfants et les besoins du foyer. Elle cherche un microcrédit pour augmenter son stock de marchandises. Entrepreneure très ambitieuse, elle souhaite augmenter ses revenus.
texts.en: Elide is 46 years old. She is divorced and has three dependent children. She sells cosmetic products and hair extensions in order to take care of her children. This business allows her to take care of her children's schooling and their household needs. She is looking for a microloan to increase her inventory. A very ambitious entrepreneur, she hopes to increase her income.

loans.use: buy hair extensions, beauty creams, and toothpaste.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy certified seeds and farm tools for use on the farm for high production and supply to earn more income.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase stocks of oranges and tomatoes to sell to clients to meet their demands and those of her family.

loans.name: Adelia

texts.en:
Adelia is 35 years old and married with one child in school. Adelia works very hard to provide for them.

Adelia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like biscuits, canned goods, home product care, and other groceries.

Adelia has been in this business for nine years. 

In the future, Adelia would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like biscuits, canned goods, home product care, and other groceries

loans.name: Gulzhan

texts.ru: Гулжан, 48 лет, замужем. У нее высшее образование, работает санитаром в больнице, также с 2005 года занимается животноводством. В хозяйстве Гулжан на сегодняшний день есть корова, 20 овец. Ежемесячная прибыль Гулжан составляет 14,000 сом (KGS), в целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк "Бай Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы от бизнеса помогут улучшить благосостояние Гулжан, а также накопить средства на покупку мебели для дома.
texts.en:
Gulzhan is 48 years old and married. She has a post-secondary education and works as an orderly at a hospital. She also began raising animals in 2005. Gulzhan now has a cow and 20 sheep on her farm. Gulzhan's monthly income is 14,000 som (KGS).

In order to further develop her farm, Gulzhan has applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy livestock. The profits from her business will help Gulzhan improve her well-being, and also help her to save money to buy furniture for her home.

loans.use: to purchase some livestock in order to increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is 44 years old and married with three children. With three children in school, Agnes works very hard to provide for them.

Agnes runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell like canned goods, home product care, and other groceries.

Agnes has been in this business for 7 years. 

In the future, Agnes would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like canned goods, home product care, and other groceries

loans.name: Luyen's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Luyen, born in 1983, is a Thai ethnic woman. She has been participating in the M7-MFI program since January 2006. She currently lives with her husband and her two children, one daughter and one son, in Mai Son district, Son La province.

Her family’s main income is from cultivation, and her family has one hectare of cultivated land for coffee. After the the harvest of coffee, the income is just enough to cover the living expense of the family and save a small amount left. One of her children is in grade 2 at school and one is in kindergarten. She wants to pay for her children's school fees and maybe invest more in their education but the saved amount is not enough. Therefore she wants to take out a loan for this purpose.

She expects the loan will help her children have better learning conditions, and she will work hard to get money to repay the loan for M7-MFI on time.

loans.use: to pay for her children's school fees

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy local food like millet and peanuts that she will resell.

loans.name: Adelina

texts.en: Adelina is 48 years old, married, and has three children she is sending to school. Adelina’s husband works abroad. She sells street foods like barbecue and her income helps her husband in supporting their children's needs. Adelina wants to earn a large income to invest in their farming business. She is requesting a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy raw meat, ingredients, and materials needed in cooking street foods. She hopes that someday she could have stable income for their future.

loans.use: to buy raw meat, ingredients, and materials needed in cooking street foods.

loans.name: Gulzar

texts.ru: Гулзар, 30 лет, замужем, есть 3 детей.Образование- высшее, Гулзар работает заведущей отделом в районной госадминистрации, в поисках дохода для своей семьи, 6 лет назад Гулзар также начала свой бизнес в животноводстве и полеводстве. Благодаря упорному труду, на сегодняшний день у нее есть 2 коровы, 5 овец, 4 лошади. На арендованном участке мерою 1,0 Га она выращивает ячмень для реализации. Ежемесячная прибыль составляет около 19,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гулзар обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) для увеличения поголовья овец, приобретет 5 овец с ягнятами. Доходы от кредита Гулзар планирует вложить в увеличение и расширение ее бизнеса и ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Gulzar is 30 years old, married, and has 3 children. She has a post-secondary education, and works as a department manager in the regional government. Six years ago, in search of income for her family, Gulzar began an animal and field husbandry business. Thanks to Gulzar's hard work, she now has 2 cows, 5 sheep, and 4 horses. She grows barley for resale on a rented plot of land measuring 1.0 hectares. Her monthly income is about 19,000 som (KGS). 

In order to further develop her business, Gulzar has approached Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to increase her headcount of sheep. She will buy 5 sheep with lambs. Gulzar plans to use the profits from her loan to enlarge and expand her business, and to repair her house.

loans.use: to buy five sheep with lambs in order to increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Dinara

texts.ru: Динара успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению, она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. В хозяйстве Динары есть 5 коров, 10 овец. На 1,14 Га собственного и 1,0 Га арендованного земельного надела она выращивает фасоль и клевер. Ежемесячный доход составляет 13,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Динара вновь обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) для покупки скота и строительства загона для скота. Динара намерена развить свой бизнес, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи.
texts.en:
Dinara successfully discharged her loan, using it for its original purpose. She is thankful to Kiva and to everyone who helped with her financing. 

Dinara's farm has 5 cows and 10 sheep. On 1.14 hectares of her own land and 1.0 hectares of rented land, she raises beans and clover. Her monthly income is 13,000 som (KGS). 

In order to further develop her business, Dinara has again applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy livestock and for the construction of a shelter for her animals. Dinara intends to develop her business, which will certainly lead to an increase in her family's capital.

loans.use: to buy some livestock and build a barn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase fertilizers for top dressing her crops. This will help her get a better harvest to sell to her customers and make more income to support her family.

loans.name: Khim's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Khim, born in 1970, is a Thai ethnic woman. Her family has three members, including her husband, her daughter and herself. Her family is living in Mai Son district, Son La province.

Her family’s main income is from cultivation and breeding. The annual income after deducting all costs is about VND 45 to 50 million. However, this income is just enough to cover the living expense of the family and to save a small amount. Her daughter is still at school age so the education fees cost her a lot. Khim wants to raise sow but the saved amount is not enough. Therefore, she wants to borrow a loan to invest in raising sow.
	
She hopes that thanks to the loan, it will help her family invest effectively in the breeding, and next year when selling the breeding pig herd, she can get a considerable profit.

loans.use: to raise sow

loans.name: Samet's Group

texts.en: Samet is 29 years old and a married mother of two children, living in Battambang province. The sources of her family’s income are from rice farming, feeding pigs for sale, and a paid worker. She has been involved in these businesses for 10 years and they earn her about 42,300 KHR per day. Her crop was flooded last year, which caused her to not have enough funds to farm again this season.  Because of this, she is now leading a group to take a Kiva loan via VisionFund to buy fertilizer and seeds and pay the cost of harvesting her rice paddy. She hopes this loan will help her to earn more income and expand her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds and pay the cost of harvesting her rice paddy

loans.name: Ainagul

texts.ru: Айнагул, 51 год, в разводе, 7 детей, младшая дочь- студентка. В 2005 году она начала заниматься сельским хозяйством. У Айнагул в хозяйстве есть 3 коровы, 13 овец. Также на участке мерою 2,80 Га она выращивает картофель, пшеницу и клевер для реализации. Ежемесячная прибыль составляет примерно 6,000 сом (KGS). Однако этих средств порою катастрофически не хватает на достойную жизнь ее семьи. Поэтому в целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса Айнагул обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы от кредита Айнагул планирует направить на развитие бизнеса и образование ее детей.
texts.en:
Ainagul is 51 years old, divorced, and has 7 children. Her youngest daughter is a college student. In 2005, Ainagul began doing agricultural work. Ainagul's farm has 3 cows and 13 sheep. Also, on a plot measuring 2.80 hectares, she raises potatoes, wheat, and clover for resale. Her monthly income comes to approximately 6,000 som (KGS). However, these funds are at times catastrophically insufficient for a dignified life for her family. 

Therefore, in order to further develop her business, Ainagul has applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy livestock. Ainagul plans to put the profits from her loan toward the development of her business and the education of her children.

loans.use: to purchase some livestock in order to increase her income.

loans.name: Elshame

texts.en:
Elshame is 23 years old and single with two children.

She runs an agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Elshame is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, vaccines and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Elshame has been in this business for 2 years and also earns additional income from buying and selling personal collection products.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, vaccines and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Neang's Group

texts.en:
Neang’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Neang makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a farmer to support her family.

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Ana Mae

texts.en:
Ana Mae is a married woman with three children. Ana Mae is 36 years old and has three children who are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Ana Mae has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years. She requested a PHP 8,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell.

In the future, Ana Mae would like to save enough enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is a married woman. She is 44 years old with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Marites has a food vending business in the Philippines. Marites requested a PHP 8,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients such as meat, fish, cooking oil, flour, chicken meat, additional utensils and other materials for her food production business.

Marites has been in this business for 3 years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as meat, fish, cooking oil, flour, chicken meat, additional utensils and other materials for her food production business

loans.name: Alba Lilian

texts.es:
Alba esta solicitando un nuevo crédito para comprar bebidas, boquitas, jabón, detergentes, huevos, etc., con estos productos atenderá las demandas diarias de sus clientes, espera que las ventas se mantengan y que la inversión sea de mucho beneficio.
Ella manifiesta que al utilizar el crédito anterior para fortalecer la tienda de consumo, ha tenido un efecto positivo, está generando más ingresos, sus clientes han aumentado y logro cancelar la deuda, su familia se mantiene y juntos viven en condiciones más dignas.
texts.en:
Alba is requesting a new loan to buy beverages, snacks, soap, detergents, eggs, etc.  With these products she can meet the daily demand of her customers in the hope that her sales volume can be maintained and the investment will be profitable.

She says she used the previous loan to strengthen her store.  It has had a positive effect and generated more income.  She has more customers now and was able to pay off her debt.  Her family is well and they are enjoying better living conditions.

loans.use: To buy beverages, snacks, soap, detergents, eggs, etc. to meet daily customer demand.

loans.name: Cristian Camilo

texts.es:
Cristian es un joven con 21 años de edad, soltero, que través de unas clases y capacitaciones que recibió monto un negocio, una sala de belleza ubicada en Turbo.
Es un joven trabajador, que quiere seguir luchando para sacar este negocio adelante y así mejorar la situación económica de sus padres.
 
Con el crédito solicitado en la corporación interactuar, Cristian pagara el arriendo, mudanza y adecuaciones de su nuevo punto de trabajo, debido a la competencia que ahí en el sector sus ganancias han bajado.
Con su apoyo Cristian podrá seguir su sueño.
texts.en:
Cristian, 21, is single and received classes and training before setting up his business, a beauty salon in Turbo.  He is a hard-working young man who struggles to keep his business going so he can improve his parents' economic situation.

With the loan he is requesting through Interactuar, Cristian will pay rent, moving expenses and renovation costs for his new workplace.  Due to the competition in the sector his profits have decreased.

With your help Cristian will be able to follow his dream.

loans.use: To pay rent, cover moving expenses and renovate his new workplace.

loans.name: Ruel

texts.en:
Ruel is 22 years old, married and has one child to provide for. As a father, he wants to give his child a good life, so he is engaging in a motor shop business. He repairs motorcycles to earn income. Ruel wants to increase his income, which is why he borrowed a loan to buy tools so that he can repair more motorcycles and generate a better income.

Ruel's plan for the future is to expand his business to sustain the needs of his child.

loans.use: to buy tools for his motorcycle repair business.

loans.name: Leonila

texts.es:
Leonila a sus 51 años de edad por necesidad económica ante la ausencia de su esposo, quien falleció hace poco, comenzó a vender mercancía en la ciudad de Medellín, sus ingresos no son muchos. Por ello, solicita un préstamo que la ayude a mantener su negocio y así sostenerse ella misma.

Es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora que quiere salir adelante y que sueña con tener una vivienda propia. 
Con el crédito, ella abastecerá su negocio comprando mercancía como jeans, zapatos y lociones.

Su préstamo ayudara a Leonila a invertir en un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
After her husband passed away recently, Leonila, 51, had to earn an income and started selling merchandise in the city of Medellin.  Her income is low so is requesting a loan to keep her business running to support herself.

She is a very hard worker and struggles to get ahead, dreaming of having her own house.  She will use the loan to buy merchandise like jeans, shoes and lotions.

Your support will help Leonila invest in her future.

loans.use: To stock her business with jeans, shoes and lotions.

loans.name: Bertha Olivia

texts.es:
Mantener una familia de 4 hijos no es nada fácil y más cuando tienes 57 años de edad y las empresas te niegan una oportunidad de empleo por tu edad y por falta de experiencia, pero esto no es excusa para un madre preocupada como lo es Bertha, que inicio con la venta informal de acolchados por encargos, ella tiene una revista la cual muestra a sus clientes,  ellos escogen, y reviven su producto en la comodidad de su hogar, un plus extra que tiene la señora Bertha es que da planes de pago pero este se convierte a su vez en su principal inconveniente ya que recoger cartera es complicado.
 
Gracias a este negocio Bertha ha sacado su familia de la pobreza y tiene una buena vida. 

Bertha solicita un préstamo para cubrir un pedido de acolchados que tiene en cartera.
texts.en:
Supporting a family of four children is not easy, especially when your are 57 years old and companies will not hire you because of your age or lack of experience.  But that is no excuse for a concerned mother like Bertha who has started selling comforters on an order basis.  She uses a catalogue to show to customers who place their order and then receive at home.  Bertha also provides an extra service by selling on credit.  The greatest challenge she faces is collecting payment, which is a complicated matter.

Bertha has pulled her family out of poverty thanks to this business, and they live a good life.

The loan she is requesting is to place the orders she currently has.

loans.use: To buy wholesale comforters to sell.

loans.name: Jose Isidro

texts.es:
José, tiene 37 años de edad, es casado, su esposa tiene 30 años de edad, por el momento no tienen hijos, su negocio es cultivar maíz tanto para consumo familiar como para vender, sus actividades las desarrolla junto a su padre, trabaja todos los días, lo respalda una experiencia de 15 años.
En esta temporada de siembra ha decidido solicitar un crédito para comprar abono, insecticidas y plaguicidas para cultivar maíz  en un área más grande, limpiara el terreno y sembrara sin dificultades, espera que la cosecha sea abundante y pueda atender a nuevos clientes.
Sus aspiraciones son tener un estilo de vida más confortable y estabilidad en la economía familia.
texts.en:
Jose is 37 and his wife is 30, and for now they have no children.  He grows corn for home consumption and as a business for selling.  He works every day with his father and has 15 years' experience.

During the current planting season he has decided to request a loan to buy fertilizer, insecticides and pest control agents to plant a larger area of corn.  He will clean the fields and plant without difficulties in the hope that his harvest will be abundant and he can reach more customers.

His goal is to have a more comfortable lifestyle and a stable family economy.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, insecticides and pest control agents to expand his corn crop.

loans.name: Sara

texts.pt:
Senhora Sara tem 32 anos de idade, vive maritalmente com o seu esposo, tem 3 filhos os quais frequentam o ensino pré primário, primário e secundário, é negociante e vive na casa própria e sustenta uma sobrinha.
O montante financiado será aplicado para a compra de coco, repolho, tomate, panelas para revender de modo a obter ganhos para ajudar o seu marido pedreiro no sustento familiar.
No futuro pretende ampliar a sua casa e ampliar o seu negócio de modo a fornecer produtos em grandes quantidades bem como colocar os produtos mais perto do cliente.
A exiguidade de fundos torna seus projectos morosos, assim sendo vai continuar a fazer empréstimos de modo a alavancar os projectos.
texts.en:
Sara is 32 yeas old. She is married and lives with her husband.  They have 3 children who attend preschool, elementary school and secondary school.  She has a retail business and lives in a home she owns.  She also supports her niece.

She is requesting a loan to purchase coconut, cabbage, tomato and pans for resale, so that she can earn money to help her stonemason husband support the family.  In the future she hopes to add on to her home in order to stock products in large quantities and to have products closer to her customers. A lack of funds has slowed down her projects so she will continue to use loans to advance them.

loans.use: to purchase coconut, cabbage, tomato and pans for resale.

loans.name: Lina

texts.pt:
A  senhora Lina é operária agrícola de 55 anos de idade, viúva tem 06 filhos vive com 04  dos quais  02 a frequentar  o ensino secundário e os restantes  são maiores de idade, sustenta 02 netos  vive na casa cedida pelos serviços.
Diz  que com o valor pretende comprar areia, cimento, ferros, barrotes, arames,  pedra, para concluir a sua obra .
O seu maior sonho é concluir a sua casa, vedar e ter grandes terras para fazer as suas plantações.
A insuficiência de fundos é o seu maior desafio com os empréstimos anteriores conseguiu fazer sua casa que já esta na fase de cobertura.
texts.en: Lina is a agricultural worker.  She is 55 years old and widowed.  She has 6 children, 4 of whom live with her.  Two are in secondary school and the rest are adults. She supports two grandchildren and she lives in a house provided by the military.  She tells us that with the money she plans to purchase sand, cement, iron bars, beams, wire and stone to complete construction on her home.  Her greatest dream is to finish construction, build a fence, and have a large property to grow her crops.  Her greatest challenge is a lack of funds.  With prior loans she was able to build her house which is now being roofed.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, iron bars, beams, wires and stone.

loans.name: Marta

texts.pt:
A senhora Marta é comerciante de 37 anos, mãe solteira de 02 filhos 1 a estudar outro já maior de idade a viverem com ela. Sustenta sua mãe e 02 sobrinhos enviando lhes dinheiro mensalmente e vive na casa própria.
Diz  que com o valor irá comprar duvets,  mantas, cadeiras, plásticas para revender  por encomendas.
Tem como planos para o futuro  fazer uma barraca na sua casa para vender produtos de  1ª necessidade reforçando desta forma a renda familiar. 
Seus maiores desafios insuficiência de fundos e irá solicitar mais empréstimo, para tal,  vai honrar com o contracto .
texts.en:
Marta has a retail business.  She is 37 years old and a single mother of 2 children, one who is in school and another who is an adult.  Both live with her. She also supports her mother and two nephews by sending them money each month.  She owns her home.  She tells us she will use the loan to purchase duvets, blankets, and plastic chairs to sell on order.  In the future she plans to set up a stand in her home to sell basic goods and increase the family income.  Her greatest challenge is a lack of funds and she will request additional loans for that.  She will meet the terms of the contract.
.

loans.use: to purchase duvets, blankets, and plastic chairs.

loans.name: Lucio

texts.pt:
O Senhor  Lúcio tem 50 anos de idade, casado e pai de 05 filhos que frequentam o ensino escolar e todos estão na sua responsabilidade
É docente de profissão. Está a construir a sua casa e, com o empréstimo de 15.000,00mts, pretende comprar material de construção como: cimento, pó de pedras, carrada de areia, estribos e varrðões para reforçar o material que já tem em casa e para poder dar a continuidade da conclusão da sua casa  para acomodar a sua familia. Para além da sua carreira de docente, aos finais de semana, presta serviços de serralharia, subsidiando deste modo as suas despesas de casa.
A pesar de enfrentar dificuldades financeiras, o seu desafio é reembolsar o empréstimo dentro do prazo vinculado entre a Instituição e ele.
texts.en: Lúcio is 50 years old.  He is married and father of 5 children who attend school.  All children live at home.  He is a teacher.  He is building his home and with a loan of 15.000,00mts, he will purchase construction materials such as cement, gravel, a cart of sand, braces and beams to reinforce materials he already has in the house. His finished home will provide more comfort to his family.  In addition to being a teacher, on the weekends he also provides metalworking services to subsidize household expenses. Despite financial difficulties he plans to repay the loan within the timeframe established with the communal bank.

loans.use: to purchase cement, gravel, a cart of sand, braces and beams to reinforce the materials he already has at home.

loans.name: Dy's Group

texts.en: Dy is a 31-year-old mother of two children who are both too young to attend school. They are living in Kampong Cham province. Nowadays, she has been a rice farmer for 13 years and it earns her about 34,300 KHR per day. Dy has been an existing client of VisionFund for two loans already and fully paid back the loans. The past loans helped her to have better living conditions and have enough household supplies to use. Unfortunately, last year her crop did not grow well and it affected her daily income. Now she is lacking funds to do farming for this year, so she decided to lead a group to take a Kiva loan via VisionFund. As a group leader, she will use her loan portion to buy seeds and fertilizer and pay for plowing fees. She hopes to earn more money and extend her farming business through this loan.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer and pay for plowing fees.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Chiem's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Chiem is a Thai ethnic woman. She lives with her husband and her two children, one son and one daughter, in Mai Son district, Son La province.

Her family lives mainly based on the income from cultivation and breeding. Her family has over 7,000 square meters of cultivated land for coffee so the income is just enough to cover the living expenses of the family and to save a small amount of money. Her eldest daughter is at the end of junior high school in the next staring school year while her son is in grade seven at school. The saved amount is not enough so she wants to borrow a loan to pay for her two children’s education fees.

She will work hard to get money to repay the loan for M7-MFI on time, and she hopes that the loan will help her children have better conditions for learning so they will have a brighter future.

loans.use: to pay for her two children’s education fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy certified seeds to plant for high production and supply to gain more income.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and pesticide for her farming.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina is a married woman with eight children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Cristina is 37 years old and four of her children are in school.

Cristina has a buy and sell of charcoal business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy more charcoal to sell.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her business.

Cristina has been in this business for 11 years. In the future, Cristina would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Camala

texts.en: Camala is 29 years old and married. She is a mother of two kids . Her husband doesn’t work. She is an IDP (internally displaced person) and lives with family in Bilasuvar region. She is a skilled, respected, honest and also responsible and professional person. Camala is a dairy farmer. She  started keeping dairy cows eight years ago. Since then, she has developed and grown her  business steadily to a point where she is able to get more then 10 litres of milk every day that she sells to the community .Camala started this business with an amount of capital. Thanks to her hard work, she has been able to improve and expand her merchandise. The profits from this business have allowed her to expand her sales volume. Camala has already borrowed loans from Agroinvest in the past. Now she needs money and wants to buy food for her cows. She thanks Kiva lenders for their support.

loans.use: to buy food for her cows

loans.name: Archil

texts.en: Archil is from Batumi. He has a large family: wife, son, brother, parents and pensioner grandparents. Archil opened a grocery shop recently where he sells different kinds of groceries. The only income of the family is the monthly pension of Archil’s grandparents and a small profit from the shop. According to Credo estimations, the family belongs to the subsistence poor category. His loan request was approved in the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages the provision of business start-up and re-startup credits with soft conditions to the country's rural poor who do not have access to credit products, being regarded as “high-risk borrowers” because of their low income. Archil requested a loan for purchasing more stock of groceries, which will help his newly started business to develop. He will reinvest the profit in the same business. The new business initiative, financed with the Kiva Start-up loan, will significantly improve the living conditions of the family.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of groceries for his grocery shop

loans.name: Yut's Group

texts.en:
A 34-year-old mother of two children who are both in school, Yut lives in the Kampong Thom province. To support her family, she grows rice for sale as the main source of her family’s income. Her husband helps to supplement her family’s needs by working as a motor taxi driver. 

Yut has been involved in her business, rice farming, for 11 years; she earns about 42,500 KHR per day. 

Yut wishes to build a small private toilet for her family. Last year, her crop did not grow well and this prevented her from having enough money to fulfill her wish. So she decided to lead a group to take a Kiva loan via VisionFund to buy a new latrine. 

She hopes this loan will help her family to enjoy better health and a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy a new latrine.

location.town: Kampong Thom Province, Stoeng Sen District

loans.name: Chanthol's Group

texts.en: Chanthol is 51 years old and a married mother of three children who are all in school.  She has been a rice farmer and grocery seller for 18 years and lives in Kampong Thom province. Working as a construction worker is an additional source income for her family to complement their needs. Due to a lack of fund to fulfill her needs, she is now leading a group to take a Kiva loan via VisionFund to buy a decent latrine to build a small private toilet for her family. This is the first loan  for Chanthol with VisionFund, Kiva's partner. She hopes this loan will help her family members to have a better and healthier standard of living.

loans.use: to buy a decent latrine

location.town: Kampong Thom Province, Stoeng Sen District

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase wheelbarrows for transporting farm manure to his farm for the purpose of adding soil nutrients for a better harvest for family use.

loans.name: Celia Emelina

texts.es:
Celia, se dedica a vender comida y variedad de bebidas, tiene una familia formada por su esposo y sus tres hijos, no cuenta con apoyo de familiares, siendo una mujer soltera ayudaba a su familia a preparar comida para vender, cuando formo su hogar decidió tener su propio negocio para apoyar en los gastos familiares, cuenta con 12 años de experiencia, para realizar su actividad económica  tiene un horario de seis de la mañana a cuatro de la tarde.
El capital lo invertirá en verduras, especias, carnes, pollo, aceite, azúcar y otros materiales para preparar la comida que vende, su idea es aumentar la productividad del negocio y darles un mejor servicio a sus clientes. 
Las aspiraciones de Celia son ver a sus hijos culminando una carrera universitaria, ampliar su vivienda y cancelar su deuda.
texts.en:
Celia sells food and a variety of drinks.  She has a family which is made up of her husband and three children and has no other family members help to rely upon.  When she was single she used to help her family to prepare food to sell; when she started her own family she decided to have her own business to help with her family's expenses.  She has 12 years of experience, and to make the business economically viable she works from six in the morning to four in the afternoon.  

The loan capital will be invested in vegetables, spices, meats, chicken, oil, sugar and other materials for the preparation of the food she sells.  She would like to increase the productivity and provide a better service to her clients.  

Celia's aspirations are to see her children complete a university degree, make her home larger and pay off her loan.

loans.use: to invest in vegetables, spices, meats, chicken, oil, sugar and other materials to prepare the food she sells

loans.name: Gulzada

texts.ru: Гулзада, 28 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей, они ходят в садик. Семья очень трудолюбивая и дружная. У Гулзады- неоконченное высшее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством, стартовав 8 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Гулзады, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 коровы, 10 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 11,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Гулзада обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для увеличения поголовья. Доходы от кредита Гулзада планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку холодильника.
texts.en: Gulzada is 28 years old, married, and the mother of three preschool-aged children.  Her family is very hardworking and friendly.  Gulzada did not complete her higher education.  Today she works in animal husbandry, an activity which constitutes her family's main source of income.  She started in this field eight years ago when she bought her first cattle for 10,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her very hard work, she currently has three cows and ten sheep on her farm and makes a monthly income of about 11,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her farming business, Gulzada has turned to Bai Tushum CJSC and requested a loan of 20,000 som (KGS) to buy livestock and increase the size of her herd.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further increase her number of farm animals.  She is also planning to save enough money to buy a refrigerator.

loans.use: to buy some livestock in order to increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Busaro

texts.ru: Бусаро, 44 года, замужем, многодетные родители 4 детей. Все дети проживают с родителями и помогают по хозяйству. У Бусаро- среднее образование, в качестве дохода для своей семьи Бусаро занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав 5 лет назад, с 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Бусаро, на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 коровы, 14 овец, а также 0,29 ГА земельной доли, на которой ежегодно выращивает кукурузу для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет 17,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Бусаро обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку семян и удобрений для выращивания органической кукурузы. Доходы от кредита Бусаро планирует вложить в приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на обучение ее детей в университете.
texts.en:
Busaro is 44 years old and married.  She and her husband are the parents of a large family as they have four children.  All four still live at home and help with the farm work.  Busaro has a secondary education and works in agriculture and animal husbandry, two activities which provide a source of income for the family.  She started in this field five years ago with an initial capital of 10,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her very hard work, she now has two cows and 14 sheep on her farm.  On 0.29 hectares of land, she also grows corn annually, for domestic use on the farm and for resale.  She makes a monthly income of 17,000 som (KGS).  

In order to further grow her farming business, Busaro has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy seeds and fertilizers to grow organic corn.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to increase her numbers of farm animals.  She is also planning to save enough money to pay for her children's higher education.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers to grow organic corn.

loans.name: Jovelyn

texts.en:
Jovelyn is 23 years old, married, and has three children. One child is in school.

Jovelyn is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She has been in this business for three years now and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Jovelyn requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

In the future, Jovelyn would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 45 years old, married, and has four children. With three children in school, Josephine works very hard to provide for them.

Josephine runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for six years. 

Josephine requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like liquor, personal care products, and other groceries.

In the future, Josephine would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like liquor, personal care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Denys Patricia

texts.es:
Denys una mujer que con sueños, aspiraciones y mucho esfuerzo monto un negocio de confección buscando generar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, conformada por su hijo de 7 años de edad, el cual goza de buena alimentación y educación gracias a los esfuerzos de Denys.

Trabajar honradamente es el lema de esta empresaria que ha progresado a pasos cortos pero seguros hoy en día tiene buena producción para trabajar pero le falta maquinaria e insumos que no ha comprado por falta de capital.

Denys quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de una máquina plana e insumos de tela, gracias a este préstamo aumenta su producción diaria y generara un empleo.
texts.en:
Denys is a woman with dreams and aspirations who started a tailoring business with a lot a effort. She was seeking to improve the quality of life of her family, composed of her 7-year-old child. He is well nourished and has access to good education thanks to Denys' efforts.

Working honestly is the motto of this entrepreneur who has made progress taking short but firm steps. Currently she has a good production to work with but she lacks machinery and supplies that she has not be able to buy due to the lack of capital.   

Denys wants to request a loan to buy a stationary sewing machine and fabric supplies. Thanks to this loan she increases her daily production and she will create jobs.

loans.use: to buy a stationary sewing machine and fabric supplies. Thanks to this loan she increases her daily production and she will create jobs.

loans.name: Salima

texts.ru: Салима, 55 лет, замужем, есть 3 детей. У Салимы- среднее образование, 15 лет она проработала нянечкой, много лет - санитаром в больнице. В качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи она занимается сельским хозяйством, стартовав 20 лет назад. На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, 10 овец, на 0,50 Га собственного и 1,40 Га арендованного земельного надела Салима выращивает картофель, люцерну и пшеницу. Ежемесячный доход составляет 14,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Салима обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Салима планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на свадьбу младшего сына.
texts.en:
Salima is 55 years old, married, with three children.  She has a secondary education.  She has a 15-year experience as a nanny and she also used to work as a nurse in a hospital for many years.  Twenty years ago, she started working in agriculture, an activity which now constitutes an additional source of income for her family. Today she has two cows and 10 sheep on her farm.  She also grows potatoes, alfalfa and wheat on 0.5 hectares of her own land and 1.4 hectares of leased land, making a monthly income of 14,000 som (KGS).

Eager to grow her farming business, Salima has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 40,000 som (KGS) to increase her livestock headcount.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further increase her numbers of farm animals.  She would also like to save enough money towards her youngest son's wedding.

loans.use: to buy some livestock in order to increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Sao's Group

texts.en:
Sao is a resident of Kratie province; she is 46 years old and a married mother of seven children, only one of whom is in school. 

To overcome her family’s hardship, she has been growing cassava as the main source of her family’s income for more than five years. 

Sao has been with VisionFund for two cycles already and completely paid back the loans. Because her crop did not grow well last year, she did not have enough funds to do farming in this season. 

Now she is leading a group to apply for the third loan cycle to meet her needs. She intends to use her loan portion to buy seeds and pesticide and to pay the plowing fee.  She hopes to improve her family’s living through this loan.

loans.use: to buy seeds and pesticide and to pay the plowing fee

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en:
Hussein is a 39-year-old married father of three children and a Palestinian refugee who lives in a Palestinian refugee camp. 

Twenty years ago, he started working as a car electrician to cover his family's needs and expenses. He is well-known in his region for his professional skills and has a good reputation among his customers. 

Today, Hussein is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner AL Majmoua to develop his business through buying updated tools which will facilitate his work and allow him to provide his customers with better and quick service. 

Hussein hopes to expand his business more in the future to increase his income and improve his family's living conditions inside the camp.

loans.use: to develop his business through buying updated tools

loans.name: Juanita

texts.en:
Juanita is 45 years old and married with six children. With two children in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like beverages, personal care products, home care products, and others.

Juanita has been in this business for 15 years. 

In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like beverages, personal care products, home care products, and others

loans.name: Everlida

texts.en:
Everlida is 45 years old and has one child. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Everlida has a buy and sell beverages business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years.

Everlida requested a PHP 7,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy coconut wine and soft drinks to sell.

In the future, Everlida would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy coconut wine and soft drinks to sell.

loans.name: Fred

texts.en:
Fred, age 42, is married with four children, ages ranging from 5 to 18, and all attend school in Hoima, Uganda. 

He ventured into the business of operating a retail shop alongside farming where he grows cassava and beans. 

He has always aspired to expand and develop his business; however, stiff competition and inadequate capital hinder the achievement of his desires. 

He will use the loan facility to buy more stock items like cooking oil and soap.

loans.use: to buy more stock items like cooking oil and soap.

loans.name: Abanyamahoro Cb Group

texts.en:
Delphine is a group leader and she is age 28 years. The group is called Abanyamahoro, which means “Peace” in English. They sell different products and they wish to expand their businesses for a better future. 

She sells food and has been running a business for three years. With the loan, she would like to buy more rice, cassava, and bananas for sale. The profits from the business will be used to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: To buy more rice, cassava, and bananas for sale.

loans.name: Jephtelita

texts.en:
Jephtelita is 55 years old and widowed. She has three children. With one child in school, Jephtelita works very hard to provide for them.

Jephtelita runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 10 years.  

Jephtelita requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell like sugar, cigarettes, home care products and other groceries.

In the future, Jephtelita would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like sugar, cigarettes, home care products and other groceries.

loans.name: Naster

texts.en:
Naster has always been an entrepreneur with a passion to start her own business. She was working at a local health centre where the pay was meagre.
In the two years that she was at the health centre, she got experience and saved money in order to launch her own business.

This year, Naster’s dreams of business ownership came true. Naster recently started a small drug shop (small because of her limited capital). Her drug shop will provide service to the local community since the government health facility usually has no drugs. In addition, Naster feels that there is less competition in the area so she will make a considerable amount of profit. Because she is qualified, she will provide excellent service.

Naster will use the profits to support her family and make some savings to help her advance her carreer.


Naster will use his Kiva loan to purchase inventory and supplies of the human drugs for sell. She is excited to develop her entrepreneurial capacity and is ready to face all kinds of challenges.

loans.use: To boost her drug shop/pharmacy.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 44 years old and married. She has three children. With two children in school, Jocelyn works very hard to provide for them.

Jocelyn runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 23 years. 

Jocelyn requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like snack foods, condiments, home care products, and other groceries.

In the future, Jocelyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like snack foods, condiments, home care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Ainagul

texts.ru: Айнагуль, 42 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Айнагуль- среднее образование, в качестве дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 20 лет назад. Благодаря упорному труду Айнагуль, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 6 коров. На 7,0 Га земли она выращивает кукурузу, ячмень и клевер для реализации. Также продает молоко. Хозяйство развивается стабильно. Ежемесячный доход составляет 11,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Айнагуль обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку двух дойных коров для увеличения объемов реализации экологически чистого домашнего молока. Доходы от кредита Айнагуль планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Ainagul is 42 years old, married, and raising three children with her husband.  She has a secondary education and, in order to provide a source of income for her family, she works in agriculture and animal husbandry.  She started in this field 20 years ago.  Thanks to her very hard work, she now has six cows on her farm and she sells milk. She also grows corn, barley and clover for resale on seven hectares of land.  Her farming business is well developed and stable, bringing her a monthly income of 11,000 som (KGS).  

In order to further develop her farming business, Ainagul has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 80,000 som (KGS) to buy two dairy cows and sell larger volumes of organic milk.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further increase her numbers of farm animals.

loans.use: to buy two dairy cows and sell larger volumes of organic milk.

loans.name: Rubiel De Jesus

texts.es:
Comprar una vaca en periodo de gestación y dos teneros es la ayuda que necesita Rubiel un hombre del campo que ha sufrido una dificultad y fue la muerte de tres de sus vacas por motivo de vejez y ahora solicita un préstamo con mucha urgencia para contrarrestar esta adversidad que se le presenta.

El sueño de Rubiel es generar una buena calidad de vida en su hogar, ser un empresario respetado y acreditado y no pasar necesidades, solo pide la herramienta él se encargara de trabajar y crecer su negocio, se compromete a pagar puntualmente y mostrar buenos resultados.
texts.en:
Buying a pregnant cow and two calves is the help that Rubiel needs. He is a countryman who has suffered a difficulty--the death of three of his cows due to old age. He is now requesting a very urgent loan to counteract this hardship he is facing.

Rubiel's dream is to create a good quality of life in his home; to be a respected, accredited businessman; and not overlook any needs. He only asks for the tool, and he will take care of working and growing his business. He commits to paying on time and showing good results.

loans.use: purchase a pregnant cow and two calves for his business.

loans.name: Delta

texts.en:
Delta is 36 years old and lives in Chikomba West district in Zimbabwe. She is married and has three children. 

She is a committed volunteer in her community, actively helping to keep children in school. 

She raises chickens and sells them to the community. She is currently producing about 200 broiler chickens every six weeks. She loves her business and hopes to expand it. 

Delta is now self-reliant, has peace of mind, and is able to care for herself and her immediate and extended family. She has gained respect from her husband, family members and the community at large since she is now able to contribute meaningfully to the family’s needs and priorities.

The Kiva loan she is requesting will assist her in purchasing more feed and broiler chicks to increase her production and boost sales. Improving her business will help her to increase profits to pay the school fees for her children. She plans to use the other money to grow her poultry operation by building a larger fowl run and hiring someone to help with the project. 

Delta’s business serves as an example of a Kiva loan helping to grow jobs in rural communities in Zimbabwe!

Thank you for supporting Delta’s Kiva loan!

loans.use: To purchase more chicks and chick feeds and to construct a bigger fowl run.

loans.name: Rogelio Javier

texts.es:
ROGELIO JAVIER TIENE 40 AÑOS , CONVIVIENTE, VIVE EN CASA PROPIA CON SU CONYUGE Y 02 HIJOS, LOS CUALES ESTUDIAN EN COLEGIO NACIONAL DE LA ZONA. VIVE EN UNA COMUNIDAD UBICADA A 42 KMS DE LA PROVINCIA DE CHICLAYO,REGIÓN LAMBAYEQUE, COSTA NORTE DE PERÚ. VIVE EN COMUNIDAD POR GENTE AMABLE DEDICADA A LA AGRICULTURA, GANADERIA Y COMERCIO.

ROGELIO JAVIER SE DEDICA A LA CRIANZA Y VENTA DE CERDOS, DESDE HACE MAS DE 2 AÑOS.ADICIONALMENTE SE DEDICA A DAR SERVICIOS DE PEON AGRICOLA EN LA MISMA ZONA DE SECTOR PUEBLO LIBRE. NECESITA PRESTAMO PARA INVERTIR EN MEJORAMIENTO DE SU CASA, LO QUE LE GENERARA MEJORAR SUS CORRALES PARA SUS CERDOS, DE ESTA MANERA PODRÁ OFRECER UN PRODUCTO DE MEJOR CALIDAD, LO QUE LE GENERARÁ MAYORES INGRESOS Y PODRÁ MEJORAR SU CALIDAD DE VIDA.
texts.en:
Rogelio Javier is 40, partnered, he lives in house own house with his spouse and two children, who study in the national school of the area. He lives in a community located 42km from the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, northern coast of Peru. He lives in a community of friendly people dedicated to agriculture, cattle raising and trade.

Rogelio Javier has worked raising and selling pigs for more than two years. Additionally, he works giving agricultural services in the same zone of the Pueblo Libre sector. He needs the loan to invest in the improvement of his house, which will generate improving his corrals for his pigs. In this manner, he will be able to offer a product of better quality, which will generate him more income and he will be able to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in the improvement of his house, which will generate better corrals for his pigs.

loans.name: Esmeralda Yaneth

texts.es:
Esmeralda, es una persona hogareña, vive con su esposo y un hijo, su fuente de ingresos es realizar los cultivos de granos básicos, los granos son almacenados para la alimentación diaria de su familia, el resto lo vende con el fin de obtener ingresos, su negocio lo tiene desde hace 4 años y lo aprendió de su papá.
Con el financiamiento comprara los insumos agrícolas necesarios para preparar el terreno y fumigar los cultivos de granos básicos para que no sean afectados por plagas, además pagara mozos para que le ayuden a realizar los trabajos agrícolas, la finalidad de sus esfuerzos son tener una cosecha abundante y lograr cancelar su deuda con puntualidad.
Las aspiraciones que Esmeralda tiene son continuar trabajando en la agricultura y salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Esmeralda is a homely person, she lives with her husband and a son. Her source of income is to do basic grain crops. The grains are stocked for the daily feeding of her family. The rest she sells with the goal of obtaining income. She's had her business for the last 4 years and learned it from her father.

With the loan, she will buy the agricultural inputs necessary to prepare the land and fumigate the basic grain crops so that they aren't affected by pests. Additionally, she will pay young men so that they help her with the agricultural work. The goals of her efforts are to have an abundant harvest and achieve paying off her debt with punctuality. The aspirations that Esmeralda has are to continue working in agriculture and to get ahead with her family.

loans.use: to buy the agricultural inputs necessary to prepare the land and fumigate the basic grain crops so that they aren't affected by pests.

loans.name: Liza

texts.en:
Liza is 34 years old and married with five children. With three children in school, Liza works very hard to provide for them.

Liza runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, eggs, home care products, and other groceries.

Liza has been in this business for 10 years.

In the future, Liza would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, eggs, home care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Luzviminda

texts.en:
Luzviminda is a 52-year-old married woman with five children, three of whom are in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur.

Luzviminda has a buy-and-sell rice business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 8,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy sacks of rice to sell.

Luzviminda has been in this business for 14 years. In the future, Luzviminda would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Maria Genoveva

texts.es:
María, requiere de un crédito para comprar una plancha industrial, gas propano y pagara la reparación del coche que utiliza para preparar la venta de hot dogs, le permitirá ampliar su negocio y mantener siempre el buen servicio para sus clientes.
Con el crédito anterior pudo comprar la materia prima para elaborar la venta de tamales de elote, este tipo de producto lo vende solo cuando los precios del elote son bajos, las utilidades son mejores y las ha utilizado para reparar la vivienda y llevar el sustento a su hogar.
texts.en:
María requires a loan to buy an industrial grill, propane gas and to pay for the repair of the car that she uses to prepare for the sale of hot dogs. This will allow her to grow her business and always maintain good service for her customers.

With the previous loan, she could buy the prime materials to make the sale of corn tamales. She sells this type of product only when the price of corn is low; the profits are better and she has used them to repair the home and bring sustenance to her home.

loans.use: to buy an industrial grill, propane gas and to pay for the repair of the car that she uses to prepare for the sale of hot dogs.

loans.name: Maria Vicenta

texts.es:
María, es una persona que se dedica a la venta de productos por medio de catálogos, actualmente está soltera y vive con un nieto,  tiene más de cinco años de tener su negocio, el oficio lo aprendió con ayuda de sus parientes, ofrece a sus clientes lociones, jabones, labiales, y otros productos que le solicitan, su horario de trabajo es de siete de la mañana a tres de la tarde, por el momento no representa dificultades en realizar sus actividades.
