El capital le será de utilidad para comprar lociones, cosméticos, talcos, desodorantes y otros productos que sus clientes necesiten, fortalecerá su negocio para aumentar sus ventas e ingresos que le servirán para cancelar la deuda.
Los sueños que tiene María son cambiar su situación financiera y tener un estilo de vida digno.
texts.en:
Maria is a person who works in the sale of products through catalogs. Currently she is single and lives with her grandson. She has had her business for more than five years. She learned the trade with the help of her relatives. She offers her customers lotions, soaps, lipsticks, and other products that they request. Her work schedule is from seven in the morning to three in the afternoon. For the moment she is not having any difficulty with doing her job. 

The capital will be useful to purchase lotions, cosmetics, talcum powders, deodorants and other products her customers need. It will strengthen her business to increase her sales and income, which will help her pay off her debt. Maria's dreams are to change her economic situation and have a decent way of life.

loans.use: purchase lotions, cosmetics, talcum powders, deodorants, and other products that her customers need.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase spare parts such as motorcycle engines and tires for repairs and maintenance of client motorcycles so as to meet both client and family needs.

loans.name: Shakila

texts.en:
Shakila is 34 years old. She is married with four children aged between 3 and 13 years, all of whom go to school. She sells fruits and has been doing business for the past 22 years. Her husband is a businessman also.

With the loan, Shakila would like to buy more fruits to sell. The profits from the business will be used to buy food for home consumption and to renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy more fruits to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a variety of food products like palm oil and grains for resale.

loans.name: Lilian

texts.es:
Lilian, hoy en día cuenta con un negocio mejor surtido de calzado, lácteos y bolsos, lo cual es posible por la buena administración del crédito anterior y las ganancias obtenidas; su familia cuenta con mejor alimentación y vestuario.
Desea continuar progresando por tal motivo se decidió a solicitar un nuevo crédito para comprar sandalias, zapatos, y chancletas, resurtirá el inventario con nuevos estilos para atraer más clientes y seguir teniendo los ingresos que necesita para subsistir junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Lilian today has a better assortment of shoes, milk products, and bags at her business, made possible by the good administration of the previous loan and the profits obtained. Her family has better food and clothing.

She wants to continue the progress and for this reason has decided to request a new loan to buy sandals, shoes, and slippers to stock up her inventory with new styles to attract more customers and continue having the income necessary to support her family.

loans.use: to purchase sandals, shoes, and slippers to restock her inventory with new styles to attract more customers.

loans.name: Florentin

texts.es:
Florentín, administra una granja de pollos y una pequeña ganadería, el negocio está ubicado en su vivienda, además practica el cultivo de granos básicos; vive con una hija de 27 años de edad y un nieto, tiene otros hijos pero ya son independientes, junto a su hija desarrollan las actividades que el negocio demanda.
Comprará pollos y concentrado para alimentarlos, así mismo material para construir un corral en el que los pollos estarán en mejores condiciones, busca tener un negocio competitivo y que le genere nuevos ingresos.
Es una persona responsable y con mucha experiencia que tiene como visión cancelar con buena calificación el crédito y salir a delante con su familia.
texts.en:
Florentín runs a chicken farm and also raises a few cattle. The business is run from his home. He also cultivates some basic staple foods.

He lives with one of his daughters, who is 27 years old, and one grandchild. He has other children but they are already independent. Together with his daughter they accomplish all the tasks necessary to running the business. 

He will buy chickens and pellets to feed them, as well as the materials to build a poultry yard so that the chickens will have better living conditions. He is working to have a competitive business that will assure him more income. 

He is a very responsible person with a lot of experience. His plan is to pay back his loan with good standing and make a living for his family.

loans.use: to buy chickens and pellets to feed them, as well as the materials to build a poultry yard so that the chickens will have better living conditions.

loans.name: German

texts.es:
GERMAN TIENE 68 AÑOS, CASADO, VIVE EN CASA PROPIA DESDE HACE 40 AÑOS, VIVE JUNTO A SU ESPOSA Y 1 HIJA, EN EL DISTRITO DE CAYALTI, UBICADO EN LA PROVINCIA DE CHICLAYO, REGIÓN LAMBAYEQUE, COSTA NORTE DE PERÚ. LA COMUNIDAD ES DEDICADA AL COMERCIO, AGRICULTURA Y GANADERIA, BASICAMENTE.

GERMAN SE DEDICA AL SERVICIO DE MANTENIMIENTO DE VEHICULOS Y MAQUINARIA PESADA, CON MUY BUENAS REFERENCIAS DENTRO DEL RUBRO, EL DESTINO DEL CREDITO SERA LA INVERSIÓN EN COMPRA DE INSUMOS Y HERRAMIENTAS PARA TRABAJO EN TALLER, CON ELLO TENDRÁ MAYOR OPORTUNIDAD DE ATENDER A SUS CLIENTES, ASÍ PODER GENERAR INGRESOS PARA UNA MEJORA EN CALIDAD DE VIDA.
texts.en:
German is 68, married. He's lived in his own house for the past 40 years. He lives with his wife and one daughter in the district of Cayalti, located in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, northern coast of Peru. The community is dedicated to trade, agriculture and animal husbandry, basically.

German works at the service of vehicle maintenance and heavy machinery, with good references within the field. The purpose of the loan will be the investment in the purchase of inputs and tools for work in the workshop. With this, he will have a better opportunity to tend to his customers and therefore generate income for an improvement in quality of life.

loans.use: to buy inputs and tools for work in his workshop.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 22-year-old single man from Qalqilia city. He works as a construction worker and he earns a low and unstable income. Mohammad is also a student in the university where he studies accounting. 

Mohammad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to pay the university installments for the coming semester. By taking this loan, Mohammad will be able to pay part of the urgent expenses he has.

loans.use: to pay the university installments for the coming semester.

loans.name: Maricris

texts.en:
Maricris is 35 years old and married with three children. Maricris works hard to provide for her family. 

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like junk food, personal care products, school supplies, and other groceries. Maricris has borrowed and repaid seven loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from fish vending.

Maricris aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like junk food, personal care products, school supplies, and other groceries

loans.name: Abarinzibintwari Cb Group

texts.en: Pelagie is a group leader and is 49 years old. She is married with five children between the ages of 11 and 27. The group is called ABARINZIBINTWARI, which means “the great people” in English. They sell different products and they wish to expand their businesses for changing their future for the better. She has a shop and has been running a business for six years. With the loan, she would like to buy more rice, sugar, biscuits, and juice for resale. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children and to renovate her house.

loans.use: To buy more rice, sugar, biscuits, and juice for resale.

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en: Wilson used the previous loan to buy land for farming. He is a farmer who grows food crops and at the same time rears cattle for milk production. He is facing hardships of price and weather changes and loss of soil fertility that hinder expansion of his business. Wilson has asked for a loan to pay for labor to weed, prune, and mulch his banana plantation.

loans.use: to pay for labor to weed, prune, and mulch his banana plantation.

loans.name: Marina

texts.en:
Marina is a 49-year-old woman. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Marina has a business buying and selling sunglasses in the Philippines. Marina requested a PHP 6,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more sunglasses to sell.

Marina has been in this business for 12 years. In the future, Marina would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more sunglasses to sell

loans.name: Jose Adrian

texts.es:
José, es agricultor, siembra maíz para tener parte de la alimentación familiar también vende una parte para generar ingresos y costear gastos familiares, trabaja solo desde hace 15 años, su horario de trabajo es de 6:00 am. a 2:00 pm., el tiempo libre lo dedica a cantar como mariachi para tener ingresos extras, el oficio se lo inculcaron sus padres. Tiene una familia formada por su esposa y un hijo, él tiene la responsabilidad de cubrir las necesidades de su hogar.
El capital que solicita lo invertirá en abono, insecticidas y herbicidas para  iniciar la siembra de maíz, tiene fe que el invierno sea favorable para que su cultivo le dé como resultado una cosecha abundante y pueda tener a sus clientes satisfechos.
Sus sueños son ir mejorando sus cosechas, ampliar el área de cultivo y darle a su familia mejor alimentación y vestuario.
texts.en:
José is a farmer. He plants corn to have part of the family food; he also sells a part to generate income and pay for family expenses. He has worked alone for the past 15 years. His work schedule is from 6:00 AM to 2:00 PM. He dedicates free time to singing as a mariachi for extra income; his parents instilled this in him. He has a family made up of his wife and a son. He has the responsibility of covering the necessities of his home.

He will invest the capital he's asking for in fertilizer, insecticides and herbicides to start the planting of corn. He has faith the winter will be favorable so that his crop gives him the result of an abundant harvest and that he can have satisfied customers.

His dreams are to go improving his harvests, grow the planting area and give his family better nourishment and clothing.

loans.use: to invest in fertilizer, insecticides and herbicides to start the planting of corn.

loans.name: Lucia Armida

texts.es:
Lucía, está superándose con la ayuda de créditos, hoy en día cuenta con clientes satisfechos, mejores ingresos y su familia se encuentra saludable, con las ganancias ha construido parte de su vivienda y cancelado su deuda.
Nuevamente busca apoyo con un crédito para comprar gaseosas, jugos, papas, yuca, aceite, aderezos, azúcar y otros ingredientes básicos para elaborar la venta de antojitos; espera que los resultados de la nueva inversión también sean positivos como en el crédito anterior.
texts.en:
Lucía is improving herself with the help of the loans.  She now has satisfied customers and better earnings.  Her family is healthy.  With her earnings she has built part of her house and repaid her debt.

Once again she is seeking the support of a loan to buy soft drinks, juices, potatoes, cassava, cooking oil, sugar, and other basic ingredients to make the food that she sells.  She hopes that the results of the new investment will also be positive like the last loan was.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, juices, potatoes, cassava, cooking oil, sugar, and other basic ingredients to make the food that she sells.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more home energy supplies and to construct a shade in the area to attract more customers and to gain more income.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to lease land to expand his farming activity.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more stock of cereals for sale for more income gain.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Julio, es un joven muy responsable y reconocido en la comunidad por su honestidad, está acompañado, vive con su pareja y un hijo, la familia depende económicamente de él. Tiene como negocio el cultivo de granos básicos y crianza de cerdos, de muy pequeño sus padres le enseñaron el oficio, actualmente es la forma que él tiene para llevar el sustento diario a su hogar.
Debido a la llegada de la temporada para sembrar solicita un préstamo para comprar de manera inmediata insumos agrícolas para cultivar granos básicos, de esta manera se mantendrá trabajando y generando los recursos económicos para cumplir con sus obligaciones.
Sus aspiraciones son tener una cosecha abundante y que su familia tenga el sustento diario.
texts.en:
Julio is a very responsible young man, and he is well-known in his community for his honesty.  He is in a relationship, and he lives with his life partner and a son.  The family is financially dependent upon him.  He has a business of growing basic grains and raising pigs.  When he was very little his parents taught him this line of work.  It is currently the way that he brings daily sustenance to his household.

Because it is planting season, he is requesting a loan to immediately buy agricultural supplies to cultivate basic grains.  This way he will keep working and generating the financial resources to meet his obligations.

His dreams are to have an abundant harvest and for his family to have their daily sustenance.

loans.use: to immediately buy agricultural supplies to cultivate basic grains.

loans.name: Marigen

texts.en:
Marigen is 44 years old and widowed with three children. With two children in school, Marigen works very hard to provide for them.

Marigen runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like sugar, oil, home care products, and other groceries. Marigen has been in this business for three years. 

In the future, Marigen would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like sugar, oil, home care products, and other groceries

loans.name: Jorge Adalberto

texts.es:
Jorge, es una persona que le gusta mucho trabajar en el campo sembrando granos básicos, además posee una carpintería donde elabora diferentes  tipos de muebles, sus oficios los aprendió con ayuda de familiares y cuando por un tiempo vivió en el extranjero, el negocio lo fundo desde hace 3 años; está acompañado, vive con su pareja y un hijo, ambos dependen de don Jorge.
Su negocio no cuenta con el equipo necesario para atender bien a sus clientes, está solicitando un crédito para comprar silos metálicos para almacenar los granos que cultiva y madera para fabricar muebles, espera que con la inversión pueda atraer a nuevos clientes y que los ingresos sean favorables. 
Sus sueños son lograr darle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida y crecer con su negocio.
texts.en:
Jorge is a person that likes to work a lot in the country, sowing basic grains. Additionally, he has a carpenter shop where he makes different types of furniture. He learned his trades with the help of family members and when, for a time, he lived abroad. He founded the business three years ago. He is partnered; he lives with his partner and one son, both depend on Jorge.

His business doesn't have the necessary equipment to tend well to his clients. He is applying for a loan to buy metal silos to stock the grains that he grows and wood to make furniture. He hopes that with the investment he will be able to attract new customers and that the income will be favorable.

His dreams are to achieve giving his family better living conditions and growing with his business.

loans.use: to buy metal silos to stock the grains that he grows and wood to make furniture.

loans.name: Theak's Group

texts.en:
Theak is 47 years old and a father of four children; two of them are in school while the other two are too young to attend school. He is a rural villager living in Kampong Thom province. Nowadays, he grows rice as the main source of his family’s income; he is also a paid worker, which is an additional source of income to support his family’s needs. He has been involved in this business for ages and it earns him about 29,200 KHR per day. 

Due to the natural disaster, which happened in his village last year, his plant was destroyed. Now he lack the funds to fulfill his family's needs, so he leads a group to take a Kiva loan via VisionFund. As the group leader, he will spend his entire loan portion to buy a water filter for his family's use. He hopes this loan will help him to improve his family’s living conditions and keep his family members healthy by having fresh water for drinking.

loans.use: to buy a water filter

loans.name: Hanane

texts.en: Hanane is a 48-year-old Lebanese married woman who lives with her five children, some of whom are still attending school. To help her husband, she has worked diligently at producing food for the past 13 years. Her products are sold to the whole neighborhood, and people really enjoy her tasty and delicious provisions. Today, she is requesting a loan from Kiva's partner, Vitas s.a.l., to purchase foodstuffs and raw materials to continue her production. She is also planning to start visiting grocery stores, supermarkets, etc., to sell them her food to make a good income and improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase foodstuffs and raw materials

loans.name: Nadine

texts.en:
Nadine is 27 years old and has two children. She is married and has one child in school.

She is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines and requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Nadine has been in this business for two years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Sopha's Group

texts.en:
Sopha is the 37-year-old mother of two dependent children (only one among them is in school), living in Kratie province. 

Growing rice and cassava has the main source of her family’s income for three years and being a paid worker is an additional source of income. 

Last year, her crop did not grow well, which decreased her income to lower than her expected. Now she does not have enough funds to do farming for this year. 

That is why she leads a group to take a first Kiva loan via VisionFund, and she will use her loan portion to pay the plowing and labor fee for her farming. She hopes to earn more money to improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to pay the plowing and labor fee for her farming

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more metals to make cookers and knives to sell.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is 50 years old. He lives in Zugdidi District with his wife and two children. Robert has requested a loan from local financial institutions several times for an agricultural business start-up, but without any success. His loan request was always rejected, because of low income and the lack of experience in his new business, which is usually demanded by local credit providers. Robert has a plot of agricultural land where he grows nut trees. He does all relevant agricultural work to ensure a good quality harvest. The harvested products are sold locally. He also has two milk cows, whose milk is used in dairy products. 

The startup program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables him to get a loan for purchasing a tractor.  He will perform agricultural work with the tractor on the lands of nearby farmers, mainly during tilling and sowing seasons, and will be paid by landlords. It will significantly increase his income and Robert will be able to provide better living conditions for his family.

loans.use: to purchase a tractor and cultivate agricultural land

loans.name: Adelphine

texts.en:
Adelphine is 34 years old. She is married with 3 children between the ages of 2 and 10, two of whom go to school.

She sells clothes and has been in this business for the past 15 years. Her husband is a businessman. With the requested loan, she would like to buy more clothes to sell.

The profits from the business will be used to buy food for home consumption.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Chantal

texts.en:
Chantal is 35 years old. She is married with three children aged between 6 months and 8 years. Two of them go to school. 

She sells clothes and has been doing this business for the past 15 years, while her husband is a businessman. 

With the requested loan, she would like to buy more sweaters to sell. The profits from the business will be used to buy food for home consumption and pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: To buy more sweaters to sell.

loans.name: Weam

texts.en:
Weam is a 24-year-old single man. Six years ago, he started working in the construction field specializing in concrete work to cover his needs and expenses. He is a hard worker who has a good reputation with his customers. 

Weam is trying desperately to develop his business; thus, today he is acquiring a youth loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to buy necessary tools, which will facilitate his work and provide his customers with better service. Weam hopes to expand his business in the future to increase his income and improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy necessary tools to provide his customers with better service in his concrete business

loans.name: Teodoro

texts.es:
Teodoro tiene 32 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y su hija en casa propia de material rústico en el caserío Longutay, que pertenece al distrito de Santo Tomás que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Teodoro se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de café, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de años hace 05 años y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona, adicionalmente se dedica a la crianza de animales menores. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para realizar un adecuado mantenimiento de su cultivo de café así como para la contratación de mano de obra para la época de cosecha. Con esto él espera ofrecer un café de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Teodoro is 32 years old. He lives with his spouse and his daughter in a house built of basic materials in the village of Longutay, which belongs to the district of Santo Tomás located in Cutervo province, Cajamarca region in the North Andes of Peru. Life in this district is quiet. the inhabitants work mainly in agriculture, commerce and raising livestock.

Teodoro works in agriculture, specifically growing coffee. He has five years experience in the field and has good personal and work references from the area. He also works raising small animals.

He will use the loan he will be awarded to buy manure and fertilizer to carry out adequate maintenance on his coffee crops as well as paying for labor at harvest time. Doing this he hopes to offer a better quality coffee to his clients which will have a positive impact on his level of income and in the end improve his quality of living and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer to carry out adequate maintenance on his coffee crops and to contract labor at harvest time.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 43 years old, married, and supports six children. 

She has been operating a motorcycle transport business for the last 5 years earning KES 7,200 per month.

Josephine has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy a dairy cow so as to supply milk using the motorcycle for more income gain. 

She plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and educate her children. 

Her hope is to be financially stable and grow her business.

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow so as to supply milk using her motorcycle for more income gain.

loans.name: Jean Claude

texts.en:
Jean Claude is 42 years old. He is married with 4 children between the ages of 1 and 19, three of whom go to school.

He sells clothes and has been in this business for the past 20 years. His wife is a money changer. With the requested loan, he would like to buy more clothes to sell.

The profits from the business will be used to buy food for home consumption and improve his business to the extent of 90%.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Nelly works hard to support her family.

She has a vegetable vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from her general store. Nelly is borrowing PHP 9,000 through NWTF to buy more vegetables to sell for her vegetable vending business.

Nelly has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell

loans.name: Nimfa

texts.en:
Nimfa is 46 years old and single. She works very hard.

Nimfa runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, beverages, home care products, and other groceries. She has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Nimfa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, beverages, home care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is 31 years old and married. She has five children, all of whom are in school.

Rosalinda is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a 6,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Rosalinda has been in this business for 2 years now, and has borrowed 3 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Rosalinda would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies for her livestock.

loans.name: Na Tau 16 Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Thuon, 27, is Thai ethnic lady who has been married and became the mother of a boy who is now at the age of 6. She lives with her husband and her child in a small house in a remote village where people mostly rely on agriculture production for a living. 

Like many other villagers, Mrs. Thuon works very hard at cultivation and animal husbandry, with plenty of activities such as cultivating rice, cassava, edible canna, and raising pigs, chickens and ducks. Her husband is a driver of a small truck, and he sometimes supports her in agricultural production. 

This is the first time that Mrs. Thuon has taken out a loan from the Anh Chi Em Program, and she will use the loan to buy piglets to expand her pig farming. She hopes that, along with the training and counseling provided by the program, her investment will go smoothly and generate good income for her family. 

Mrs. Thuon dreams of a more abundant life for her family and a bright future for her child. In the picture, she wears a white shirt and stands at the first from the right.

loans.use: to buy piglets to expand her pig farming

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock of secondhand shoes to sell.

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
Mary Ann is 32 years old and married with four children. With three children in school, Mary Ann works very hard to provide for them.

Mary Ann runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like bread, canned goods, home care products, and other groceries.

Mary Ann has been in this business for four years. 

She successfully repaid her previous loan, and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

In the future, Mary Ann would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like bread, canned goods, home care products, and other groceries

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy spare parts for repairing his car.

loans.name: Jose Tivis

texts.es:
José, atiende una venta de productos de la canasta básica, la cual está funcionando desde hace más de 2 años, de esta manera genera recursos económicos para ir solventando las necesidades de su hogar. Vive en casa familiar junto a su madre.
Está necesitando de un crédito para comprar arroz, frijol y maíz en quintales ya que estos son productos con alta demanda por sus clientes, el objetivo es tener el inventario del negocio surtido a un costo menor y así ofrecer precios accesibles a sus clientes, espera atender nuevos clientes y generar mejores ingresos.
La visión del sr. José es cubrir las necesidades de sus clientes y apoyar siempre a su familia.
texts.en: José takes care of his sales of basic food items, which he has been running for more than two years. In this way he generates economic resources to pay for the needs of his household. He lives in the family house together with his mother. He needs a loan to buy rice, beans and corn by the quintal as these are products in high demand by his clients. His objective is to stock his store's inventory at a lower cost so he can offer accessible prices to his clients. He hopes to have new clients and generate more income. José idea is to cover the needs of his clients and always support his family.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans and corn by the quintal as these are products in high demand by his clients.

loans.name: Gerard

texts.en:
Gerard is 34 years old. He is married with two children, aged 2 and 5 years old. One of them goes to school. He owns a shop and has been in this business for the past seven years, while his wife is a business lady. 

With the loan requested, he would like to buy more sugar, rice, and cooking oil to sell. The profits from the business will be used to buy food for home consumption and to improve his business to the extent of 85%.

loans.use: To buy more sugar, rice, and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to hire cocoa gardeners for future harvesting.

loans.name: Navy's Group

texts.en:
Residing in a rural area of Kratie province, Cambodia, Navy is 39 years old and married. She has three beloved daughters who are still under her care; two of them are in school. Navy earns her living through farming cassava and selling grocery items. She has been involved in her current businesses for thirteen years. 

Navy is a first-cycle client with VisionFund.  She is leading a group to take out a loan in the amount of 4,200,000 KHR in total. With her requested loan portion, Navy will buy pesticide, fertilizer and pay for plowing fee to support her cassava farming. She believes that with the help of this loan, she can boost her income to improve the living standard of her family and her ability to keep sending her children to school.

loans.use: to buy pesticide, fertilizer and pay for plowing fee to support her cassava farming

loans.name: Khea's Group

texts.en:
Khea is a resident in Keo Seima district of Mondulkiri province. She is age 49 years old and a mother of five children; three of them are dependent children who still depending on her. 

Nowadays, she grows cassava on 3.5 hectares of farmland as the main source of her family’s income. Selling grocery items is the additional source of income to complement her family’s living. She has been involved in this business for two years, and it earns her about 93,000 KHR per day. 

Because of the low quality of crop yields and a lack of funds, she is now leading a group to take a Kiva loan via VisionFund. She will be using her loan portion to buy seeds and pay for the plowing fee. 

This is the first loan cycle for Khea with VisionFund, Kiva’s partner, and she hopes to improve her family’s living conditions through this loan.

loans.use: to buy seeds and pay for the plowing fee

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more stock of maize cereals in order to sell to her clients and meet their needs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more stock of clothes to sell to her clients.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more stock of manufactured hair extensions and a  blow-dryer for her beauty salon to meet clients' demands.

loans.name: Thea

texts.en:
Thea is 44 years old. She lives in a rural area of Kratie Province’s Prey Prorsorb District, and is a mother of four children. 

Nowadays, Thea grows potatoes and works for others for a fee to earn extra income. Having been in these businesses for 26 years, she can make around 20,000 KHR per day. Her crops have been destroyed by insect pests, and this is the main challenge for her farming business.

This is the first loan for Thea with VisionFund (Kiva’s Field Partner). Through this loan, she will renovate her old house. She expects that this loan will make her house more comfortable and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to renovate her old house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cloth to make aprons and dishcloths

loans.name: Secundina

texts.es:
Secundina es una persona muy trabajadora, que lucha para poder seguir creciendo y mejorando en su microemprendimiento, es una mujer muy luchadora y sacrificada, que con trabajo y lucha ha ido superándose cada día. Comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en la compra de ganado para poder seguir con su cría.
Ella pide este nuevo préstamo para poder comprar mas animales para la cría y de esa forma poder seguir con su trabajo y lucha.
texts.en:
Secundina is a very hardworking person, striving to keep growing and improving her micro-enterprise. She is a very determined and sacrificing woman, who with hard work and struggle is overcoming each day. She says that her previous loan was used in the purchase of cattle to continue their breeding.

She is requesting this new loan to purchase more animals for breeding and thus be able to continue with her work and struggle.

loans.use: to purchase animals for breeding.

loans.name: Holiarisoa Claire

texts.fr:
Holiarisoa Claire, une femme travailleuse de 39 ans est mariée. Son époux est chauffeur de taxi mais il n'est pas le propriétaire de la voiture qu'il conduit. Ils ont trois enfants dont l'ainé est déjà marié et les deux autres encore à sa charge sont tous scolarisés.
Comme activité source de revenu, elle se spécialise dans la confection et vente des couches bébés en tissus lavables et ceci depuis 2004. Elle arrive à coudre 80 pièces de couche en une journée. Elle a beaucoup de clients qui sont tous des revendeurs. Son affaire marche admirablement actuellement et le prêt va lui permettre de  mieux ravitailler les stocks de tissus.
L'objectif des deux époux est d'acheter une voiture que le mari pourra utiliser comme taxi dans un premier temps et puis construire une maison ensuite.
texts.en:
Holiarisoa Claire, a hard-working woman of 39, is married. Her husband is a taxi driver but he does not own the vehicle he drives. They have three children of whom the oldest is already married; the two others are both in school.  

As a way to earn a living, Holiarisoa Claire is specialized in making and selling baby diapers out of washable cloth. She has been doing this since 2004. She manages to sew 80 diapers a day. She has lots of clients who are resellers. Her business is doing wonderfully well at present and the loan will allow her to stock more raw materials. 

The goal of the two spouses is first to buy a car that Claire's husband can use as a taxi, then later to build a house.

loans.use: to buy cloth for baby diapers, as well as sewing thread, plastic bags, and labels

loans.name: Neta

texts.es:
Neta es de la ciudad de Santaní, es separada, y comenta que es dueña de una farmacia, es la única en su localidad y es por eso que tiene mucha clientela. Es muy conocida en la zona, y hace como 10 años que trabaja en ello.
Ella está poniendo todo de sí para poder seguir creciendo y mejorar su microemprendimiento. Pide este préstamo para la compra de medicamentos para poder surtir su farmacia y de esa forma poder cubrir con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Neta is from the city of Santaní.  She is separated, and she says that she is the owner of a pharmacy.  It is the only one in the area; because of this, she has a large customer base.  It is well-known in the area, and she has been working in it for about ten years.

She is giving it her all in order to keep expanding and improving her microenterprise.  She is asking for this loan for the purchase of medications to stock her pharmacy.  In this way she can meet her customers’ demand.

loans.use: to buy medications in order to stock her pharmacy

loans.name: Chrystophe Jocelyne

texts.fr:
Christophe Jocelyne est une femme courageuse et dynamique de 38 ans. Elle est divorcée, et son ex-mari lui a laissé seule avec leurs deux enfants de 14 et 12 ans.
Son activité, source de revenu est la broderie, c'est sa tante qui lui fournissait la formation, elle y est depuis l'an 2000.
Grâce à ses grands efforts et ses persévérances, elle a actuellement beaucoup de clients et commandes, et par conséquent, elle doit employer des gens pour l'aider à broder. Le prêt va lui permettre de renouveler les stocks de tissus et fils à broder.
Son objectif est de pouvoir acquérir des clients à l'étranger et exporter ses œuvres, de tenir en bonne marche son activité afin de pouvoir continuer à offrir une meilleur éducation à ses enfants et améliorer tant qu'elle pourra le niveau de vie de sa famille en dépit de son divorce.
texts.en:
Christophe Jocelyne is a courageous, dynamic 38-year-old woman. She is divorced; her ex-husband left her alone with their two children, aged fourteen and twelve.

Her money-making business is embroidery. She was trained by her aunt and has been practicing since the year 2000.

Thanks to her vigorous efforts and perseverance, she currently has many clients and orders; consequently, she has to employ people to help her with the embroidery. The loan will help her to restock fabrics and embroidery threads.

Her objective is to be able to gain clients abroad, to export her works, and to keep her business functioning well, so that she can continue to provide her children with a better education and improve the family’s living conditions despite her divorce.

loans.use: to buy fabric and threads.

loans.name: Raweya

texts.en:
Raweya is a 47-year-old married mother of two children. Two years ago, she opened a toy and gift shop in an attempt to help her husband cover the increasing needs and expenses of their family. She is an ambitious lady and sacrificing mother who is working hard to develop her business and improve her family's living conditions.

Today, Raweya is acquiring a loan from Kiva's Field Partner Al Majmoua to increase her business merchandise with a new collection of toys and gifts. This will help her satisfy her customers' special requests. Raweya hopes to expand her business in the future to increase her income and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise with a new collection of toys and gifts.

loans.name: San Antonio Group

texts.es:
El comité SAN ANTONIO, es un grupo con 17 integrantes, es un grupo nuevo, que vio la necesidad de ayudarse para poder dar a sus familias una mejor calidad de vida. Son de una zona aun en crecimiento y muy rural.
La Sra. Daniela es muy emprendedora y sus actividades se basan en el cultivo y la cría de animales, comenta que por medio de este humilde trabajo está ayudando a su familia y a sus seres queridos para tener una vida digna y sin privaciones.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de animales de corral para la cría y venta, como ser chanchos, gallinas, y otros. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de poder mejorar.
texts.en:
The San Antonio committee is a group of 17 members.  It is a new group that saw the need to help each other in order to be able to give their families a better quality of life.  They are from an area that is still growing and very rural.

Daniela is very enterprising, and her work centers on raising animals.  She says that through this humble work she is helping her family and her loved ones to have a worthwhile life, without great need.

She is asking for this loan to be able to invest it in the purchase of barnyard animals to raise and sell, such as pigs, chickens, and others.  She is thankful for this opportunity that she is given to be able to improve.

loans.use: to buy animals to raise such as pigs, chickens, and others.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is a married woman with three children. She is 55 years old and two of her children are in school.

Teresita is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She has a food vending business in the Philippines. Teresita requested a 5,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her business.

Teresita has been in this business for six years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Saren's Group

texts.en:
As a 59-year-old mother of six children, Saren lives in the Battambang province. Growing rice has been the main source of her family’s income for 32 years and it earns her about 62,200 KHR per day. She is able to save about 24,000 KHR each day. 

Saren has been with VisionFund for eight cycles already and completely paid back the loans. Those previous loans helped her to have enough household supplies for her family. The low quality of crop yields and a lack of working capital are the main challenges that she has faced. Due to these cases, she is now leading a group to apply for a new loan via VisionFund. As a group leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer for her farming. She hopes this loan will help her to earn more income to improve her family’s living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farming.

loans.name: John Patrick

texts.en:
John Patrick is a 33-year-old hardworking married man with two children ages 5 and 2 years. He and his family live in Kamwenge, Uganda. He farms and also offers motorcycle transport for additional income. He hopes to buy a mini bus to improve his means of transport. This vision has been hindered by bad weather that has affected his farming and motorcycle businesses plus inadequate capital.
He is requesting a loan to buy another motorcycle.

loans.use: to buy another motorcycle.

loans.name: Nieves

texts.en: Nieves is 43 years old, married and blessed with one child. She owns and has managed a small boutique within her town for almost two years. She aspires to make her business more viable and profitable, but she has insufficient capital. For this reason, Nieves wants to access a loan of 25,000 PHP to buy more stock of dresses, footwear and bags to resell. She hopes that she will avail her loan request to be able to improve the business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of dresses, footwear and bags to resell.

loans.name: Khorn's Group

texts.en: Khorn is 46 years old and a married mother of eight children, three of them still depend on her to look after them and are in school. She is a rural villager living in Battambang province. Khorn earns an income to support her family through rice farming, selling grocery items and fishing. She can potentially earn about 105,600KHR per day and is able to save around 25,000KHR per day for emergency needs. For Khorn, this is her seventh loan cycle and the past loans have helped her to have enough household supplies and consumables for her family, as well as giving her the ability to send her children to school. Now she is asking to take this loan to buy fertilizer and pay for labor fees. She hopes this loan will help her to earn more income and improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay for labor fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more stock of shoes for sale to clients to meet client and family needs.

loans.name: Yusif

texts.en:
Yusif is 68 years old. He is a married  man with five kids. All of his children are married and live separately. 

Yusif is a very old and retired man. He lives with his wife in Absheron region. He takes care of his family only with his monthly pension. Sometimes his children help him, but still, it's not enough to solve family problems. 

Now his only dream is to receive medical treatment. He has a health problem. For this reason he needs your support. A loan which he needs from Aqroinvest CU and Kiva lenders will help him.

loans.use: to receive medical treatment

loans.name: Sayuni Mukago Vasiila Group

texts.en:
Geofrey is a hardworking, married man living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He runs a bar shop to earn income to support his family. He also practices farming, where he gets supplementary income to buy food for the family. He hopes to educate all his children, although he is limited by competition from other traders, which limits his level of sales and profits.  

Geofrey is a member of Sayuni Mukago Vasiila group, in which members guarantee each other to get a loan.

He is requesting a loan to buy more crates of sodas, beer and cartons of water to sell.

loans.use: to buy more crates of sodas, beer and cartons of water to sell.

loans.name: Muhwezi

texts.en:
Muhwezi, a 29-year-old single father of one child, aged four, lives in Kamwenge, Uganda. He operates a motorcycle (boda boda) transportation service as his main source of income, and earns extra income from farming. 

Muhwezi started  his service to look after his child, and he faces the challenge of the many accidents that occur on the roads, as well as fuel  price fluctuations. He has a vision of becoming a prominent businessman. 

Muhwezi is requesting a loan to finish constructing his house.

loans.use: to finish constructing his house.

loans.name: Sarin

texts.en: Sarin is 28 years old and lives in Kandal province with her husband and four children, one of whom is in school. For the last five years, her main source of income has been growing rice. To overcome their family's hardships, her husband also works as a security guard to make additional income to support the family. Sarin earns about 40,400 KHR per day and saves around 18,000 KHR per day. This is the second loan she has requested; she used the first one to  improve her family’s living conditions. She plans to use this loan to buy seeds and fertilizer, and pay a plowing fee. She hopes to earn more income so that she can send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer and pay for a plowing fee.

loans.name: Mujeres Valientes Group

texts.es:
El comité MUJERES VALIENTES, es un grupo conformado por 17 mujeres realmente valientes que se esmeran día a día por salir adelante a través del trabajo digno y cooperativo, se encuentran en el tercer ciclo.
La Sra. Obdulia es integrante de este comité, se la caracteriza por su laboriosidad y gran espíritu emprendedor, es joven y muy activa, se desempeña como comerciante, cuenta con una mercería en su casa donde ofrece productos de toda clase.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar productos varios para su mercería, como ser prendas, calzados, artículos de bazar y otros, y con ello poder seguir con su trabajo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder crecer y salir adelante.
texts.en:
The committee Mujeres Valientes is a group made up of 17 women who are truly courageous, who go to a lot of effort every day to get ahead through dignified and cooperative work. They find themselves in their third cycle.

Obdulia is a member of this committee. She is characterized by her industry and great entrepreneurial spirit. She is young and very active. She works as a merchant, and has a sewing supplies shop in her home where she offers all types of products.

She is requesting this loan to be able to purchase a variety of products for her sewing supplies shop, such as garments, footwear, stationery items, and others, and with it be able to continue with her work. She is thankful for the opportunity that she is receiving to be able to grow and get ahead.

loans.use: to purchase garments, footwear, stationery items, and others.

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is a hardworking 53-year-old married man who lives in Kamwenge, Uganda. He used a previous loan to buy manure for his farm, where he grows pineapples as his main source of income. He started this business to improve his standard of living and educate his children. John still faces challenges such as changes in the weather and diseases that affect his produce. His goal is to become a modern farmer, and is requesting this loan to buy herbicides and mulch for his farm.

loans.use: to buy herbicides and mulch for his farm.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane is 37 years old, married and supports three children. She has been operating a general retail store for the last 10 years and earns about KES 17,000 per month. Jane has applied for her first loan, for KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya, to buy more used shoes to sell. She plans to use the profits she expects to earn to repay her loan and educate her children. Her hope for the future is to be financially stable and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more used shoes to sell.

loans.name: Tunda La Umoja Group

texts.fr: C'est depuis 2010 que Jacques a entamé l'activité rizicole qu'il a appris de sa famille, voisins et amis. Ces derniers, dit-il m'ont aidé à maîtriser les cycles de riz pour ne pas cultiver en dehors de saisons. Ce qui lui plait actuellement ce sont les réalisations de la culture du riz (frais scolaires, vêtements,...) malgré qu'il connaît l'insuffisance de fonds alloués à son activité. Il a pour projet d'élargir son champ et de diversifier les variétés cultivées suivant les commandes de clients. Tout ceci permettra à sa famille de se retrouver dans l'abondance alimentaire et de scolariser ses enfants sans distinction. Président du groupe TUNDA LA UMOJA, il est sur photo, au centre de quatre autres membres et porte un tricot blanc.
texts.en: Jacques started growing rice in 2010, a practice he learned from his family, neighbours and friends. "These people helped me understand the rice cycles so I don't start growing crops outside of the seasons," he says. He is happy with the riches that growing rice has brought into his life (such as being able to pay for school fees and clothing) despite the lack of funds given to his activity. His plan is to increase the size of his field and to diversify his crops according to customer requests. All this will allow his family to be food sufficient. And all his children will be able to receive educations. The President of the Tunda La Umoja Group, Jacques is the man wearing the white and blue shirt, standing in the middle of the other four members in the photo.

loans.use: to hoe their fields and purchase phytosanitary products

loans.name: Losanto

texts.es:
El señor Losanto es de la ciudad de Santaní, está casado y tiene hijos, quienes son su principal razón de lucha, él se dedica a la venta de carbón y a la agricultura, su señora se dedica a la cría de animales de corral, y por medio de sus trabajos se ayudan para poder salir adelante.
Losanto es un señor muy trabajador, responsable y muy honesto, que está esforzándose por crecer y salir adelante. Pide este préstamo para poder comprar carbón en cantidad y de esa forma poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Senor Losanto is from the city of Santani.  He is married and has children, who are his primary motivation to persevere.  He works selling charcoal and also in agriculture.  His wife works at raising small farm animals.  Through this work they help each other to be able to provide for their family.

Losanto is a hard-working, responsible and honest man who is striving to grow and move forward.  He is asking for this loan to be able to buy charcoal in quantity and in this way continue with his work as he has been doing.

loans.use: to buy charcoal to sell

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
El comité se llama MUJERES UNIDAS, como su nombre lo indica este grupo está conformado por 18 mujeres muy unidas con el deseo de salir adelante una al lado de otra, se encuentran en el tercer ciclo y con muy buenas expectativas sobre los trabajos que estamos llevando a cabo con ellas.
La Sra. Nancy es integrante de este grupo, es una señora joven y muy emprendedora,  ella prepara comidas como empanadas, milanesa, sándwich, chipas,  etc. Y sale a venderlas por su barrio junto con sus hijos, es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora que lucha por mejorar.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para poder hacer sus comidas, como ser verduras, carne, condimentos, y otros, de manera a poder seguir con la elaboración de sus comidas.
texts.en: This group is called MUJERES UNIDAS ('Women United'), and as its name implies is comprised of eighteen women very united in their desire to succeed together. They are in their third loan cycle, with very good expectations about the work we are doing together. One of the members, Nancy, a very enterprising young woman, prepares foods such as empanadas, meat dishes, sandwiches, rolls etc. She goes out to sell her foods around her neighborhood with her children. She is an extremely hard-working self-starter who tries hard to get ahead. She is requesting this loan to be able to buy ingredients for her foods, such as vegetables, meat, condiments, and others, and continue preparing her dishes.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meat, condiments, and other ingredients

loans.name: Amka Group

texts.fr: Mawazo est commerçante, membre de la banque communautaire «Amka», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, mariée, âgée de 57 ans, mère 4 enfants  dont 2 étudient et 2 sont mariés. Elle est vendeuse des denrées alimentaires dans un dépôt du centre commercial de la place depuis 30 ans. Elle commença son business avec de fonds reçu de son champ. Elle va s’approvisionner en 4 sacs d’haricots. Elle souhaite acheter une parcelle, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au final, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables
texts.en: Mawazo is a storekeeper and member of the Amka community bank, a client of IMF. She is a 57-year-old married mother to four children, two of whom are currently receiving an education whereas the other two are married. She has been selling food products out of a local shopping centre stockroom for 30 years. She started her business with funds earned from her plot of land. With this loan, Mawazo wants to purchase four bags of beans. With the profits, she hopes to be able to purchase a plot of land, as well as educate and feed her children. Finally, she would like to thank Hekima for the support they give to entrepreneurs excluded from the traditional banking system.

loans.use: to purchase four bags of beans

loans.name: Tarasisio

texts.en: Tarasisio used his previous loan to buy fertilizer and manure for his farm. He still grows bananas as his main source of income, and also raises goats and cattle. He started these businesses in order to earn a living and look after his family. Tarasisio still faces hardships in the form of price fluctuations and inadequate capital, but he has a vision of becoming a prominent businessman and a modern farmer. He is requesting a new loan to buy more goats and cows for his farm.

loans.use: to buy more goats and cows for his farm.

loans.name: 8 De Diciembre Group

texts.es:
El grupo 8 de Diciembre forma parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde todas ponen su mejor esfuerzo para poder ayudar a sus familias.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Mirian quien tiene Huerta quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, es decir, se encuentra en un nivel de pobreza extremo que está luchando y esforzándose por mejorar.
La Sra. Mirian solicita de este préstamo para la compra de Semillas de Tomate, locote  y otros, lo que le ayudará  a la misma a obtener más producción y más venta el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The 8 de Diciembre group forms a part of the program for the elimination of poverty, where they all put in their best effort to be able to help their families.

One of the members is Mirian, who has a vegetable garden, and who in her last survey showed a level of poverty in the first level, that is, she finds herself in a level of extreme poverty. She is struggling and making an effort to improve.

Mirian is requesting this loan to purchase tomato seeds, green pepper seeds, and others, which will help her to get more output and more to sell, which will help her to improve her income.

loans.use: to purchase tomato seeds, green pepper seeds, and others.

loans.name: Brok's Group

texts.en: Brok is 40 years old and lives in a rural area of Kampong Cham province with her four children. For the last 20 years, the family's income has come from cassava and rice farming. She earns about 29,000 KHR a day to support her family and is able to save around 11,000 KHR each day. Brok has been with VisionFund for six loan cycles, and used her past loans to improve her cassava crop. Now she is leading a two-person loan group, and plans to use her portion of this loan to buy fertilizer and pesticide and pay labors to plow her farmland. She hopes to increase the size of her crop and fulfill her dream of buying a hand tractor.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticide and pay for a fee to plow her farmland.

loans.name: Zunilda

texts.es:
La Sra. Zunilda es de la ciudad de Ybycuí, está casada y tiene 2 hijos,  vive con su pareja y con 2 de sus 5 hijos, ella comenta que hace varios años tuvo que viajar al exterior para poder procurarse un mejor futuro.
Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora que está esforzándose por mejorar cada día, ella se dedica a la venta de productos primarios.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de productos de primera necesidad para la venta, como ser verduras, frutas, comestibles y otros.
texts.en:
Ms. Zunilda is from the city of Ybycuí, is married and has 2 children. She lives with her partner and with 2 of their 5 children. She says that several years ago, she had to travel abroad to be able to have a better future.

She is a person who is very hard-working and a fighter, who is striving to improve every day. She makes a living by selling commodities. She requests this loan to be able to invest it in the purchase of essential commodities to sell, such as vegetables, fruits, groceries and others.

loans.use: to purchase essential commodities to sell, such as vegetables, fruits, groceries and others.

loans.name: 1 De Noviembre Group

texts.es:
17 son las mujeres que integran este grupo llamado 1 de Noviembre, se formaron en la ciudad de Caaguazú, todas ellas mujeres jefas de familia, que están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza.
Delia, una de las integrantes, se destaca por su laboriosidad, es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora, que lucha por poder crecer y salir adelante. Ella quiere ir mejorando en su emprendimiento, el cual es la venta de ropas, y con ello poder seguir ayudando a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar prendas de todo tipo para la venta, como ser remeras, jeans, blusas, camperas y otros, y con ello poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
This group, made up of seventeen women and named First of November, was formed in the city of Caaguazú. All of these women are the heads of their households, and are in a program to eliminate poverty. 
One of the members, Delia, is known for her strong work ethic, she is very hard-working and enterprising and tries hard to grow and get ahead. She wants to improve her business, which is selling clothing, and consequently keep helping her family out. 
She is requesting this loan to buy all kinds of clothing items to sell, such as t-shirts, jeans, blouses, jackets and more, and continue with her sales business.

loans.use: to buy t-shirts, jeans, blouses, jackets and more

loans.name: Inacio

texts.pt:
O senhor Inácio é serralheiro tem  27 anos de idade casado maritalmente sem filhos e vive em  casa própria.
Diz  que com o valor pretende comprar cantoneiras , elétrodos, tranqueta, reguladores  para sua oficina de serralharia na sua casa.
Seus planos para o futuro são ampliar sua casa, fazer  carta de condução e reforçar o negocio  de sua esposa que tambem tem uma banca em casa e oficializar seu casamento. 
Desafios insuficiência de fundos e para superá los conta com ajuda de sua esposa  que é comerciante e irá solicitar mais empréstimos.
texts.en:
Inácio is 27 years old and works as a locksmith. He is married with no children and owns his own home. He plans to use the money to buy cabinets, regulators, bolts, and electrodes for the locksmith business that he runs from his house.

Inácio's future plans are to expand his house, get a drivers license, help his wife with the store she runs from their home, and get married officially. His main challenges have been due to a lack of money, and to meet them he has counted on help from his wife and her business and also on the possibility of getting loans.

loans.use: buy cabinets, regulators, bolts and electrodes.

loans.name: Arnaldo

texts.pt:
O senhor Arnaldo de 50 anos de idade, casado, trabalhador, pai de 4 filhos dos quais 3 frequentam o ensino primário e 1 ainda sem idade escolar, vive em casa própria.

Com o valor do empréstimo pretende comprar, cimento, ferros, arames, barrotes, chapas de cobertura, varões para dar continuidade da sua obra.
O cliente tem como sonho, concluir e ampliar a sua casa para oferecer um lar melhor a sua família e futuramente comprar uma viatura para o seu dia-a-dia.
Os principais desafios são financeiros, tem estado a trabalhar e pretende tomar mais vezes o credito para superar as suas dificuldades e alcançar os seus objetivos.
texts.en:
Mr Arnaldo is 50 years old, married, has a job and is the father of 4 children. 3 of them go to primary school, one is too young to go to school and they all live in a house he owns.

With this loan he plans to buy cement, iron, wire, bricks, sheet metal and rods to continue the building work [on his house].

He dreams of finishing and expanding his house to offer a better home for his family and in future of buying a vehicle to day-to-day use.
His main challenges are financial. He has been working hard and intends to ask for further loans to help him overcome his difficulties and reach his goals.

loans.use: buy cement, iron, wire, bricks, sheet metal and rods to continue the building work [on his house].

loans.name: Luz Divina Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Luz  Divina  está en su ciclo número 2º del programa de comité de mujeres, donde con mucho entusiasmo   
realizan actividades para poder ayudarse entre todas. Todas ellas participan activamente en las actividades propuestas. 
La Sra. Teodora es una de las miembros de este grupo, ella se dedica a la venta de remedios naturales, es un trabajo muy humilde que ella hace y con el cual tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia. Teodora es una mujer muy sacrificada y luchadora que quiere salir adelante por sus seres queridos.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar remedios naturales para la venta, y con ello poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
The group named Luz Divina [Divine Light] is in their second cycle withing the program of women committees, where with great enthusiasm they do activities so they can all help each other out. All of them participate actively in the proposed activities.

Mrs. Teodora is one of the members of this group and works in the sale of natural remedies. It is a very humble job, and through it she obtains the means necessary to be able to help her family. Teodora is a hardworking and driven woman who wants to get ahead in life for her loved ones' sake.

She requests this loan so she can buy natural remedies so she can afterwards resell them, and so be able to continue working as she has been so far.

loans.use: to buy natural remedies for resale.

loans.name: Domingos

texts.pt:
O senhor  Domingos tem 28 anos de idade, casado, trabalhador, comerciante de venda de material de construção, pai de 3 filhos estes sem idade escolar e vive em casa própria.

Com o valor do empréstimo pretende comprar, cimento, ferros, arames, barrotes, varões para aumentar o volume da sua mercadoria.
O cliente tem como sonho, ampliar o seu negocio para satisfazer as necessidades dos seus clientes concluir e ampliar a sua casa para oferecer um lar melhor a sua família e futuramente pretende comprar uma camioneta para lhe facilitar o seu negocio.
Os principais desafios são financeiros, e a falta de camioneta pessoal tem feito com que ele gaste muito para obter mercadoria, tem estado a trabalhar e pretende tomar mais vezes o credito para superar as suas dificuldades e alcançar os seus objetivos.
texts.en:
Mr Domingos is 28 years old, married, hard working, sells construction material and is the father of 3 children too young to go to school. He lives in a house he owns.

With this loan he plans to buy cement, iron, wire, bricks and rods to increase the volume of his products for sale.

He dreams of expanding his business to satisfy his clients' needs, to complete and expand his house to offer a better home for his family and in future also to buy a truck to help with his business.
His main challenges are financial ones and not having a truck has meant that he has spent a lot of money getting his products to him. He has been working hard and intends to ask for further loans to help him overcome his difficulties and reach his goals.

loans.use: buy cement, iron, wire, bricks and rods to increase the volume of his products for sale.

loans.name: Unidas De San Lorenzo Group

texts.es:
El grupo tiene 17 integrantes, todas ellas son mujeres jefas de familia que se esfuerzan por poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de sus familias. Están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, luchando por mejorar.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Hermelinda, quien vende todo tipo de prendas, comenta que su trabajo es muy duro ya que hoy en día tiene mucha competencia y es muy difícil, pero pese a ello quiere seguir esforzándose por sus seres queridos. Hermelinda es una persona luchadora y emprendedora que quiere salir adelante, es por ello que siempre participa de una manera muy activa en las capacitaciones.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de ropas, para que con ello pueda seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
The group has 17 members. All of them are women and heads of household who exert themselves to be able to improve their and their families’ living conditions. They are part of the program for the elimination of poverty, struggling to improve.

One of the members is Hermelinda, who sells all types of garments. She comments that her work is very hard since these days she has a lot of competition and is very difficult, but despite this she wants to continue making an effort for her loved ones. Hermelinda is a determined and entrepreneurial person who wants to get ahead. It is because of this that she always participates in the trainings in a very active way.

She is requesting this loan to purchase clothing, with which she will be able to continue with her sales as she has been doing. She is thankful for the opportunity that she is receiving to continue to grow.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of garments to sell.

loans.name: Flores De Amapola Group

texts.es:
Este grupo está dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, están en su grupo número 1, todas ellas están luchando y esforzándose para mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de su familia.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Cristina quien se dedica al forrado de jarras y termos, y con ello se gana la vida de una manera digna y honesta. Cristina es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora que está luchando para poder mejorar y ayudar a sus seres queridos.
 Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de jarras, termos, cuero y otros insumos para poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo y mejorando.
texts.en:
This group is part of a poverty elimination program, in it's number 1 group. All of the women are fighting and making an effort to improve the living conditions for themselves and their families.

One of the members is Ms. Cristina, who makes a living by decorating jars and thermoses, and through this she makes a living in an honest and dignified way. Cristina is a very hardworking and entrepreneurial woman, who is fighting to be able to improve and help out her loved ones.

She is requesting this loan to be able to invest it in the purchase of jars, thermoses, leather and other supplies in order to continue with her work as she has been doing. She is grateful for the opportunity she is receiving to be able to continue growing and improving.

loans.use: to purchase jars, thermoses, leather and other supplies.

loans.name: Ana

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Namaacha província de Maputo tem 38 anos de idade, vive maritalmente é mãe de 4 filhos dos quais 3 é frequentam a escola, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém. 
É avicultora a mais de 8 anos onde ganha um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Solicita o empréstimo para adquirir pintos, ração e vitaminas. Este é o seu 6º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende ampliar o volume do seu negócio de criação de frangos e iniciar um outro negócio de criação de poedeiras para a produção de ovos.
Tem como desafio obter lucros no negócio para adquisição de uma viatura que lhe permita fazer escoamento dos produtos da machamba.
texts.en:
Born in the Namaacha province of Maputo, Ana is 38 years old, lives with her partner and is the mother of 4 children. 3 of her children go to school and she's not responsible for anyone else.

She has been an aviculturist for more than 8 years, making a sum of money which she dedicates to household expenses. She's asking for a loan to buy chicks, ration and vitamins.

This is her 6th loan with Hluvuku.
In future she plans to expand her business breeding chickens and start a new business breeding laying hens to produce eggs.
Her challenge is to obtain a profit from her business and to buy a vehicle which will allow her to sell fresh fresh produce as well.

loans.use: buy chicks, ration and vitamins.

loans.name: Kuña Katupyry Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Kuña Katupyry está haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 6 integrantes se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir, en una situación de pobreza extrema.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Adriana, quien comenta que entre el trabajo que ella hace es la venta de comidas, y así ayuda su familia con los ingresos que obtiene. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora que lucha para poder salir adelante y mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para poder hacer sus comidas, como ser verduras, carne, condimentos, hortalizas y otros. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
The group Kuña Katupyry is doing a survey of poverty elimination, where 6 members are under the poverty line, in other words, in a situation of extreme poverty. 

One of the members is Ms. Adriana, who says that among the work she does is selling food, and therefore helps her family with the income she earns. She is a very hardworking and entrepreneurial woman, who is struggling to get ahead and improve her living conditions. 

She is requesting this loan to be able to purchase ingredients to be able to make her food, such as vegetables, meat, condiments and others. She is grateful to be receiving this opportunity to be able to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, meat, condiments and others.

loans.name: San Agustin 2 Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado San Agustin 2 está en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde cinco señoras se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir en una pobreza extrema.
Una de las personas que se destaca es la Sra. Lidia, quien se dedica a la venta de remedios naturales y también a la venta de comestibles que ella misma hace y que después sale a vender de manera ambulante. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora, que está esforzándose y poniendo todo de si para poder crecer.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de remedios naturales para la venta y también de insumos para poder seguir haciendo sus comidas. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir con su trabajo.
texts.en:
The group named San Agustin 2 is in its cycle number 1 of the program of the women’s committee, where they all work and help themselves to get ahead. They are doing the interview for the elimination of poverty, where five ladies find themselves below the poverty line, that is in extreme poverty.

One of the people who stands out is Lidia, who makes a living from selling natural remedies. She also sells food that she herself makes and that she then sells on foot. She is a very hard-working and entrepreneurial woman who is making an effort and putting in all of herself to be able to grow.

She is requesting this loan to purchase natural remedies to sell and also supplies to be able to continue making her food. She is thankful for this opportunity that she is receiving to be able to continue with her work.

loans.use: to purchase natural remedies to sell and also supplies to be able to continue making her food.

loans.name: Geneva

texts.en: Geneva is a 47-year-old single female with four children all attending school living in Kasese, Uganda. She operates a textile shop of clothes and she also owns a retail shop of general merchandise to generate additional income. She began the business in order improve her standards of living. Geneva needs the loan to buy more shirts, dresses and other clothes (bitenge) to sell. Geneva is a hard-working woman with a dream of expanding the business and educating her children like any loving single mother. However, she is faced with a challenge of inadequate capital and price fluctuations.

loans.use: to buy more shirts, dresses and other clothes (bitenge) to sell.

loans.name: Alphonsine

texts.en: Alphonsine is 32 years old. She is married with two children aged between three and seven years. One of them goes to school. She owns a mini market and has been in this business for the past five years, while her husband is a businessman. With the loan, she would like to buy more milk, juice and yogurt to sell. The profits from the business will be used to buy food for home consumption.

loans.use: to buy more milk, juice and yogurt to sell.

loans.name: Marta

texts.es:
Marta es de la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo, a la vez que estudia también trabaja, y de esa forma está luchando para poder cumplir con sus sueños.
Su mayor deseo es ser una profesional exitosa. Agradece a la Fundación Paraguaya por la oportunidad brindada.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Marta is from the city of Coronel Oviedo. She is studying and working at the same time, and in this way is fighting to be able to fulfill her dreams. 

Her greatest desire is to be a successful professional. She is grateful to the Fundación Paraguaya for the opportunity given to her. She is requesting this loan to be able to pay the fees for her education and therefore be able to continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Saroeurn's Group

texts.en: Saroeurn is 54 years old, living in Kampong Cham province. She is a mother of six children, with two of them in school. Nowadays, she grows cassava and works for others for a fee to earn additional income. Having been in this business for 21 years, she can manage to earn about 19,000 KHR per day. Her crops have been destroyed by insect pests and is the main challenge for her farming. She has been with VisionFund for a second cycle already and has completely repaid her past loans. She is now leading a group of three members to apply for another loan. Saroeurn, who is the leader, will use her loan to spend on labor fees for her cassava plantation. She highly hopes that this loan will help her to timely grow her cassava and gain more yields in order to extend her farmland.

loans.use: to spend on labor fees for her cassava plantation.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es:
Beatriz es estudiante de enfermería, está cursando el tercer Año y comenta que su meta es culminar sus estudios, y su sueño es ser una profesional destacada.
Ella está poniendo su mejor esfuerzo y comenta que le inspiran sus padres y sus hermanos, que son personas muy trabajadoras y siempre le ayudan en lo que ella necesita.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Beatriz is a nursing student, who is in her third year and says that her goal is to complete her studies. Her dream is to be an outstanding professional. 

She is giving her best effort and says that she is inspired by her parents and her brothers, who are very hardworking people and always help her with whatever she needs. 

She is requesting this loan to be able to pay the fees for her higher education and to be able to continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farm input for use on the farm for high production and supply for more income gain.

loans.name: Cristian

texts.es:
Cristian actualmente se encuentra estudiando y trabajando, vive en la ciudad de Itá con sus padres y hermanos, la meta que tiene es de recibirse como profesional para tener una mejor posición en el trabajo y ayudar a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos de titulación y de esa forma poder cubrir ese gasto grande que tiene. Agradece por la oportunidad que esta recibiendo.
texts.en:
Cristian is currently studying and working. He lives in the city of Itá with his parents and siblings. His goal is to be received as a professional, to be able to have a better position at work and help his family. 

He is requesting this loan to be able to cover his expenses for his degree and in this way to be able to cover this significant expense he has. He is grateful to be receiving this opportunity.

loans.use: to pay expenses for his degree.

loans.name: Anonymous
